158b8(mdo sde): srog gcod yongs spangs na// kun gyis bkur zhing tha mar byed// rtag tu nang med tshe yang ring // bde zhing sgyid la gnod pa med// skye ba'i gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas
159a1(mdo sde): skyed yul lam la les// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // myur du bla med byang chub 'thob// ma byin ler pa yongs spangs na// mkhas pas bkur zhing bla la
159a2(mdo sde): pa 'dod chags skye zhing lam kun zhi// 'dod chags med pa skye bar 'gyur// skye ba kun tu longs spong ldan// sprin bdag chen por dar 'gyur te// rin char yang nges brgyan pa dang // 
159a3(mdo sde): yid 'ong sangs rgyas zhing yang 'thob// 'dod pas log g.yem yongs spangs na// nyon mongs dri ma zhi bar 'gyur// 'dod chags sred pa'i mtsho yang skems// rnam ngag sangs rgyas
159a4(mdo sde): zhing myur 'thob// sems can rnam pa mang po yang // 'dod pa'i 'das las 'byin par 'gyur// theg chen la ni rab bkod nas// tshangs pa'i spang ba spyod du btsung // brdzun du
159a5(mdo sde): smra ba yongs spangs na// 'phags pa'i dbang dang ya shes 'thob// rtag tu bden la smra bar dga'// brdzun du 'gyu ra ba'i sdug bsngal 'jil// tshig gcig tshang mar bcugs pas
159a6(mdo sde): nasangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // brdzun mi smra ba bsgoms pas na// byang chub chen po myur du 'thob// phra ma'i tshig sla yongs spangs na// dge pa'i chos kyi snod 'gyur// sas
159a7(mdo sde): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // chad par lta bar yong mi 'gyur// 'phags pa'i chags med dga' ba dang // rin chen gter gyi gzungs 'thob cing // zab mo'i chos kyi rgya mtsho rig/ 
159a8(mdo sde): myur du bla med byang chub 'thob// gal te zhe gcod tshig spangs te// 'jam zhing gnyen pa'i tshig smras na// sems can kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur// snga ma'i mi dge'i las kyang zhi/ 2
159b1(mdo sde): rnams rtag tu dga' ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i ston par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mang po'i spyod yul shas// sa bcu las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur// kyal bar smra ba yongs spangs na// mkhas
159b2(mdo sde): par bkur zhing bla mar byed// gzhan la tshig tu smra ba kun// yon tan rnam lnga 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshig nyan cing // 'phags pa'i lam tshol spro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya
159b3(mdo sde): mtsho yangs rdzogs shing // thams cad mkhan pa myur du 'thob// gal te chags sems yongs spangs te/ 'phags pa rnams la mi smod cing // dur smrig gyon la mchod pa byeng // theg pa
159b4(mdo sde): gsum gyi byang chub bsgrub// rtag tu rnas dag zhing du skye// ston pa'i gnasu gnas par 'gyur// bla med theg pa la zhon te// rgyal ba'i ye shes myur du 'thob// gal te gnod sem
159b5(mdo sde): yongs spangs te// gcig tu byams pa'i sems bsgoms na// mnyam par gzhag pa 'ang myur du 'thob/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul mos par 'gyur// rnam dag sangs
159b6(mdo sde): rgyas zhing du skye// nyes pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral// de la gnas na byang chub 'thob// gnod sems thams cad spang bar bya// ngan par lta ba yongs spangs te// rnam dag dad pa'i se
159b7(mdo sde): bsgoms na// theg gsum ston la mos byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa byed// ngan song kun las yongs thar te// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang phrad// byang chub sems
159b8(mdo sde): dpa'i yon tan ldan// ye shes mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur// dge ba bcu'i las lam gyis// byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs// snyoms par 'jug dang gzungs rnams
160a1(mdo sde): dang // sa dang bzod pa skye bar 'gyur// bdag nyid che ba'i 'khor lo 'dis// ngan song thams cad rab bcom nas// sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang choms// myur du byang chub
160a2(mdo sde): po 'thob// 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las/ dge ba'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug go// 
160a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
160a4(mdo sde): 'khor le de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas tham sa cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sa
160a5(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed
160a6(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / bal glang dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / lus kyi yan lag dang / rkang pa
160a7(mdo sde): dang / lag pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mgo dang / mig dang / rkang dang / klad pa dang / lhag pa dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / yul dang / srid dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran po dang / 
160a8(mdo sde): dran mo dang / khang khyim dang / zhing 'brag la sogs pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa de ra ra byed na/ lus dang / srog la mi lta zhing bdag gcig pu 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das
160b1(mdo sde): pa'i bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir sems bskyed de/ sbyin pa byed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin ba'i
160b2(mdo sde): sems bskyed// thabs mkhas pa dang / shes rab mchog bskyed pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa
160b3(mdo sde): smin pa'i sems bskyed// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/ smin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed// gzhan las spago snyam pa med pa'i sems dang / brlang ba med
160b4(mdo sde): po'i sems dang / phrag dog med pa'i sems dang / sar sna dang / zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyino// gang sbyin pa sbyin pa'i dngos po che yang rung / chung yang rung / chung
160b5(mdo sde): du na zan chang gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na yang / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed// nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi ro hA
160b6(mdo sde): smin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed// gang sbyin pa'i dngos po che yang rung / chung yang rung / nung nga
160b7(mdo sde): na zan chang gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye sa su bsngo zhing / sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
160b8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po'i zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dang ldan na/ theg ma sems skyed pa na/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongasu bsal ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / 
161a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
161a2(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongasu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed pa ni
161a3(mdo sde): byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems med kyi bdag gi dbul ba de spang ba dang / bdag sdug bsngal las thar pa dang / bdag bde ba thob par bya ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' b.ru
161a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa sbyin pa byed de/ sems can thams cad da kyi phyir sbyin pa byed pa ni ma yino// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa ni byams pa dang / snying rje
161a5(mdo sde): chen po'i sems kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi dngul 'phongs pa spong ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las 'don pa dang / sems can thams ca
161a6(mdo sde): bde ba thob par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed kyi/ bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir sbyin pa spyod pa ma yino// de lta bas na nyan thos dang / rang
161a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi the
161a8(mdo sde): pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing yongasu bsrung bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
161b1(mdo sde): spyad pa na/ 'dod pa rnam lnga'i mchog la sems mi chags te/ bdag nyid dbang ba bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sems can kun la sbyin pa byed de/ sems can thams cad yongasu sngang
161b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang / bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad la ci mi snyam pa'i bzod pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i sems dang / sems can
161b3(mdo sde): thams cad la bde ba sbyin pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sems la gnas te sbyin pa byed// de bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
161b4(mdo sde): las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad
161b5(mdo sde): kyi mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang / bsrung ba byed par 'gyuro// rigs kyi bu gal te 'dod pa lnga la sem sa mi chags shing / byams pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyi/ 
161b6(mdo sde): pa byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o// gal te 'jig
161b7(mdo sde): rten gyi 'dod pa rnam lnga yang ma spangs la/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po yang med par sbyin pa byed na/ sbyin pa'i dngos po tshang med grangs med dpag tu med pa btang yang
161b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ 'am thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin pas/ sbyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi phyar
162a1(mdo sde): rgyas btab pa mas mo// debs na 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga spangs te/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sbyin pa bya'o// gal te 'jig nas kyi 'dod pa lnga ya
162a2(mdo sde): spangs la/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po yang med par sbyin pa byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang mi bya la/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yino// rigs kyi bu 'dod pa rnam
162a3(mdo sde): lnga la chags pas sbyin pa byed na/ bdag nyid kyi lus sdug bsngal gyi cha cung zad kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur na/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa bsal ba lta ci smras
162a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa// zang zing sbyin pa'i 'khor lo ldan pa// mkhas pa bsam pa dag pa'i mos pas/ 
162a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnam lnga dag ni spangs te// sems can kun la phan dang bang byed// sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir gyi/ rnam smin 'bras bu phyir ni ma yin// smin pa'i dngos po
162a6(mdo sde): byin pa chung yang // yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang // 'dod pa rnam lnga dag la gan sa na// 'phags pa dag gi phyag rgyas ma btab// ma nges
162a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs la gnas 'gyur// sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa rlung yang // 'dod pa lnga la mi gnas pa ni// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal ba yi// yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// nga bas 'ad
162a8(mdo sde): brnam lnga spangs la// rtag tu rnam dag sbyin pa byed cing // sems can kun la bde ba byas na// yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
162b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos ldan pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod/ byang chubs ma dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldanapa// thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu
162b2(mdo sde): bsal ba'i phyir/ myur du nyi ma'i sgron pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
162b3(mdo sde): kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas par 'gyu ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
162b4(mdo sde): lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi thag pa dang ldan pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos dang theg pa chen po
162b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / 'jig rten gyi chos dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang / zag pa zad pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos
162b6(mdo sde): dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dang / gnyisu med pa'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad cing gus par byed pa dang / ji skad thos pa rnams
162b7(mdo sde): gzungs 'dzin cing yid la byed do// rab tu rtog go// mthar khong du chud par byed cing gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par ston par byed do// nam chos ston pa'i tshe na/ phrag dog med pa'i sem+ba dang
162b8(mdo sde): ser sna med pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal med pa'i sems dang / rnyed par mi re ba'i sems dang / gzhan mi smod pa'i sems dang / bdag mi stod pa'i sems dang / bsti stang dang bcas pa'i sam
163a1(mdo sde): dang phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa chen po'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems bya'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni nyan thos kyi nges sngon
163a2(mdo sde): cing 'chad kyi/ de la rang sangs rgyas kyi ches sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i
163a3(mdo sde): ches ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i gang zag la ni theg pa chen po'i ches ston gyi/ nyan thos dang / rang
163a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston gyi/ dbang po snod ma gyur pa la chos mi ston to/ 
163a5(mdo sde): gang theg pa chen po'i sems can la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sbed cig par ram/ nyan thos kyi theg pa spyod cig/ bar mi sku 'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi
163a6(mdo sde): sems can la skabs kha cig tu theg pa chen po spyod pa la nan tan byos shig ces bskul ba'i skabs ni yod de// nyar thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs
163a7(mdo sde): kha cig tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang / zag pa chen po'i sbed pa la nan tan gyis shig ces bskul ba'i skabs kyang yod// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i dam pA
163a8(mdo sde): ches/ chung ngu na tshig su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig su bcad pa byed tsam la yang shin tu dad cing bkur bsti byed kyi/ de la 'phya ba 'am/ skur pa 'am/ bgegs sam
163b1(mdo sde): bar chad mi byed/ chos ston pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / ches nyan pa'i 'khor rnams la nad pa dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / gang 'chad pa'i chos la sman bzang
163b2(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar 'du shes shing / 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bcad/ re ba med pas dam pa'i chos ston to// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi sbyir
163b3(mdo sde): pa go mtshan po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ myur du nyi ma'i 'od ces bya
163b4(mdo sde): ba'i tingange 'dzin 'thob cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi
163b5(mdo sde): zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuro// de nas bcom ldan 'a
163b6(mdo sde): kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigs bcad bka' stsal pa/ mkhas pa chos kyi sbyin pa spyod pa dag/ snang bzhin theg pa gsum gi chos ston to// theg pa
163b7(mdo sde): gzhan dag de la ston mi byed// thos nas de la 'phya zhing skur mi 'gyur// dbang po snod bzhin dam pa'i chos ston gyi// dbang po snod min ngag la ma yino// so sor ji ltar ji lta
163b8(mdo sde): mos pa bzhin// de dang de yi chos sgon mgu bar byed// theg pa chen po spyod pa'i gang zag la// theg pa chung ngu rnams kyi chos mi ston// bar bar theg pa gnyis kyi gang dag la/ 
164a1(mdo sde): theg pa 'bring dang rab kyi chos ston to// shin tu dad cing gus pas chos mnyan gyi// de la 'phya zhing skur bar mi bya'o// ches sla ba la mchod pa byed pa ni/ sangs
164a2(mdo sde): rgyas 'dra bar de la 'du shes bskyed// kun nas nyon mongs pa yi nang bsal phyir// dam pa'i chos kyi sman dag mnyan par bskul// khe dang grags pa shin tu ring spangs te// dam pa'i
164a3(mdo sde): chos dag bstan cing bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i go ma chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ 
164a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongasu bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la
164a5(mdo sde): shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cang
164a6(mdo sde): kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
164a7(mdo sde): dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ thun mong ba dang / thum mong ma yin pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo
164a8(mdo sde): thun mong ba gang zhe na/ gang khyim na gnas pa dge bsnyen ma'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa blangs pa/ yang na rab tu byung ba so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa ste/ 
164b1(mdo sde): sdom pa 'di dang so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang
164b2(mdo sde): thun mong ba yino// byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa 'di'i dbang gis/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa chod par ram/ log par lta ba
164b3(mdo sde): sel bar ram/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / 'khor ba las grol bar mi 'gyur te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes kyang mi bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi ba ste/ 
164b4(mdo sde): na thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi 'ang yang dag pa yang ma yino// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen por
164b5(mdo sde): 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / gnod pa med pa'i
164b6(mdo sde): sems dang / 'khom du 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims bsrung // tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / byams
164b7(mdo sde): pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo can rab 'bring tha ma kun la bye brag mi 'phyed pa'i sems dang / khyad par med pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khrims yongasu srang ngo
164b8(mdo sde): khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la zhe sdang med pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / ngan par spong ba med pas tshul khrims yongs srang // srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang
165a1(mdo sde): dang snre ma rnam la rtog pa med pas rdul khrims yangs srung // ded pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung // gzugs yod pa'i khams lam
165a2(mdo sde): mi gnas par tshul khrims sra // gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srangango // srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi gnas par rdul khrim
165a3(mdo sde): srung rnyed pa dang / mi rnyed pa la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // 'ang byed rnams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam
165a4(mdo sde): par dag pa go ma chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i go chen
165a5(mdo sde): bo'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na// thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bsngal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyam thos dang rang sangs rgyas
165a6(mdo sde): thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams
165a7(mdo sde): cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigs bcad bka' stsal pa/ khyim na
165a8(mdo sde): gnas shing sdom pa lan pa// rab byung so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims// theg pa gnyis dang thun mong ba yin// byang chub chen po zhes ni mi bya// mkhas pa stong pa ming ches sgom pa/ 
165b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun la mi rten mi gnas// srid pa kun la gnas ma yin par// rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung // mtshan ma spang ba'i tshul khrims dag ni// chags pa med zag pa kun med
165b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims 'di ltar srung ba dag ni// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'dra
165b3(mdo sde): lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang
165b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
165b5(mdo sde): theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrang ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// de la ji ltar na bzod pa 'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
165b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i bzod pa la mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis te/ gang zhe na/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa'i
165b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi bzod pa gang zhe na/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ste/ sems can la dmigs pa/ len pa dang bcas pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin
165b8(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu la rten pa/ bsod nams kyi las la brten te/ bzod par byed pa'o// gzhan yang bdag gi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la brten nas badz+ra
166a1(mdo sde): par byed pa'o// 'jug pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ci mi snyam pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / mthu zhan pa'i bzod pa sems can gtong ba'i bzod pa dang / g.yo ba
166a2(mdo sde): rgyar bcas pa'i bzod pa dang / pha rol la 'dring pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don mi byed pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten
166a3(mdo sde): gyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ bzod pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang thun mong ba yin gyi/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya'o// de ni byang chub sems dpa
166a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig
166a5(mdo sde): rten las 'da' ba'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ zag pa med pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi chos chen po'i 'od kyis sems can dzad
166a6(mdo sde): la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir chags pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / bya ba'i dngos po thams cad dang / tshig tu smra ba dang / rgyu dang mtshan ma dang / yi ge dang / sgra skad thams
166a7(mdo sde): cad yongasu bcad pa'i skye mched la brten pa'i bzod pa la spyod do// bzod pa 'di bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum dang / bskal pa rnam gsum dang / mtsham nyid gsum
166a8(mdo sde): dang dus gsum dang / srid pa gsum dang / 'du byed rnam gsum dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang / chu bo bzhi dang / mdud pa rnam bzhi dang / nye bar len pa bzhi dang / lus
166b1(mdo sde): kyi mdud pa rnam bzhi la sogs pa yongasu bcad pas/ bzod pa 'di bsgom pa'i tshe/ sems dang yid rab tu zhi bas/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i go ma chen
166b2(mdo sde): bo'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go mchen po'i 'khor mo'i bzod pa de dang ldan pas/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas
166b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos
166b4(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / 
166b5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'ad kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad bka' stsal pa// bzod pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 
166b6(mdo sde): mtshan mar bcas dang mtshan ma med pa// mtshan mar bcas pa'i bzod pa chags yong// mkhas pa dag ni de la mi stong // 'du byed rnam gsum phung po khams dang // skye mched la
166b7(mdo sde): brten bzod pa sgom pa// de ni zag bcas bzod pa yin te// byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin// phyin ci log pa rnam bzhi bsal nas// chags pa med pa'i bzod pa sgom
166b8(mdo sde): zhing // 'du byed rnam pa gsum ngag zhi na/ bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstong 'gyur// 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi zhing // rtog pa thams cad yongasu spangs te// sems ni mama'
167a1(mdo sde): 'dra bar mnyam pa// bzod pa 'di la thams cad stod 'gyur// thams cad ches la ro gcig 'dun par// stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i zhi ba// sems ni ci la'ang mi ga
167a2(mdo sde): mi chags// bzod pa 'di ni phan don cher 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi go ma chen po'i 'khor lo yod/ byang chub sems
167a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bskul te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa
167a4(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bso de nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsra
167a5(mdo sde): ba dang / bstan bkur byed par 'gyuraro// de la ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rnam pa
167a6(mdo sde): gnyis te/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu 'a
167a7(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsul nan tan byed// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las dang / 
167a8(mdo sde): tshul khrims srung ba'i bsod nams kyi las dang / bsgom pa'i bsod nams byed pa'i las so// las 'di dag byed pa ni/ brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum zhes bya ste/ brtson 'grus rnams
167b1(mdo sde): 'di dag ni/ sems can 'di dag ni dmigs pa/ zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la brten pa/ bsod nams kyi las la brten pa ste/ de
167b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o// brtson 'grus 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sogs pa dang thun meng yin te/ ga mtshan po'i 'khor
167b3(mdo sde): zhes mi bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yino// de la ji ltar na
167b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ sems
167b5(mdo sde): na thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis/ nyon mo sa pa'i las dang / sdug bsngal thas cad sel ba ste/ len 'grus 'di ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa
167b6(mdo sde): zag pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ rten dang gnas med/ brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / tshul khrims dang / ngan pa'i tshul khrims can dang / byams par
167b7(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma kun la mi 'byed pa'i sems dang / bye brag med pa'i 'du shes kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus ro mo// khams gsum gyi sem
167b8(mdo sde): thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / dmigs pa med pas bya ba'i las byed/ smra ba dang / rtag pa dang / dpyod pa'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems kyis/ shin tu 'bang de
168a1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus ro mo// srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas/ shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste// 'dod pa'i lu
168a2(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i
168a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa kun la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson
168a4(mdo sde): 'grus dang / 'du byed rnams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po gsum la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i
168a5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la shin/ tra brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems pa
168a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang brtson 'grus kyi ge cha chen po'i 'khor
168a7(mdo sde): lo de dang ldan na// thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
168a8(mdo sde): las shin tu 'das te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnye
168b1(mdo sde): bkur byed par 'gyuro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa// dbang po drug la shin tu chags pa'i// zhus pa chu bo lngas
168b2(mdo sde): ni khur ba// shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom yang // mkhas pa rnams kyis de la smed 'gyur// sems can dmigs shing zag dang bcas la// len par bcas shing brtson 'grus tshem na/ 
168b3(mdo sde): yang dag bsod nams zhing ma yin te// byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin// mkhas pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa dag ni// chags pa thams cad ring du spangs te// sems ni ci la 'ang mi gan
168b4(mdo sde): mi chags// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya// ming dang gzugs la chags pa med cing // phung po khams dang skye mched spangs te// thams cad 'khor gyi rten du 'gyur ba// 'di ni byang chu
168b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po// 'jig rter spyod kyang nu zla bzhin te/ 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rlom pa'i mthar phyin// 'khor lo 'dis ni yongasu bcom pa// skye bo kun nas nyon mangs
168b6(mdo sde): b.rings pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
168b7(mdo sde): gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ 'og ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongasu bskul te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
168b8(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// 
169a1(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sam gdan la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa
169a2(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bsam gtan gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas/ bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / khams la gnas nas pas
169a3(mdo sde): gtad sgom pa dang / skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam
169a4(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par grol ba gsum la gan
169a5(mdo sde): nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bani la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa da
169a6(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan skem pa dang / dbang po lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gnas lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub
169a7(mdo sde): yon leg bdun la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgrim pa dang / sa'i khams la gnas nas bsam ga
169a8(mdo sde): sgom pa dang / chu'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 
169b1(mdo sde): nam mkha'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 
169b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tsher ba la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' sra
169b3(mdo sde): skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med min skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa
169b4(mdo sde): dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la gnas nas
169b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung ngu la gnas nas bsam gtan skem pa dang / 'du shes chen po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshang med pa
169b6(mdo sde): la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpe'i 'jig rten
169b7(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o// bsam gtan 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba zhes bya ste/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
169b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yino// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las
170a1(mdo sde): 'das pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / khams dang bral bar bsam
170a2(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar bsam
170a3(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par thar pa gsum dang
170a4(mdo sde): bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 
170a5(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan ste/ pa dang / stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom
170a6(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sa'i khams dang
170a7(mdo sde): bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams dang bral
170a8(mdo sde): bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / namakha'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde bar tshor ba
170b1(mdo sde): dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal du tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa/ bde ba yang ma yin par tshor ba dang bral bar bsam
170b2(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med min sna
170b3(mdo sde): mtshad dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang
170b4(mdo sde): 'jig rter pha rol dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes rlung ngu dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dungs
170b5(mdo sde): med pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam ga na 'di ni 'phags pa'i 'od zer chen po skyed pa/ zag pa zad pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ chags pa med pa
170b6(mdo sde): ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi go mtshan po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam
170b7(mdo sde): gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga yosu bstsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / 2nga
170b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod rnams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams
171a1(mdo sde): cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigs bcang bka'
171a2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ bdag gi khur ldi spong ba'i phyir ni// dmig nga bas pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms te// bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs gcod 'dod// yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyidi mi yin// snod la
171a3(mdo sde): rten cing rtog dang bcas pa// rnam par grol 'dod ting 'dzin sgom yang // tshu rol pha rol mu la gnas na// sems can dag la phan don byed min// sems can kun la phan dang bde phyir/ ling
171a4(mdo sde): 'dzin sgom zhing kha lce spangs te// kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sel ba// da ni yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid/ sems can thams cad sim par byed phyir// mi gnas
171a5(mdo sde): pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms te// 'dod pa'i srid pa thams cad chod pa// de ni blo gros chen po zhes bya// srid pas bcing pa thams cad bkrol te// 'jig pa med pa'i grong du
171a6(mdo sde): gzung phyir// rab tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o// 'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes
171a7(mdo sde): ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po bcu pa// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go ma chen po'i 'khor
171a8(mdo sde): lo zhes bya ba yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ theg ma sems bskyod pa nas// 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya/ 
171b1(mdo sde): thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis
171b2(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// de la ji ltar na shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 
171b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes rab ce na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos
171b4(mdo sde): klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / nyan pa dang // pha rol la ston cing 'chad pa 'ba' shig la brtan te/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar
171b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi shes rab kyi sgron ma 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos shin tu 'bad pa'i
171b6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyis klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa dang / 
171b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la ston cing 'chang pa dang
171b8(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan du spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i chos la brtson 'grus su klog pa dang / 'dod pa dang / nyan pa dang
172a1(mdo sde): glags bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la yang rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa ste/ 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i lam gyi
172a2(mdo sde): lag tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam du gtogs pa'i rnam par grol ba tshol ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba yang dag pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed pa
172a3(mdo sde): ma yin te/ rtag tu lta ba dang bcas pa/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed// de ltar len pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni/ byang chub sems dpa
172a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi shes rab ces bya'o// shes rab de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ ge ma chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
172a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yi no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig
172a6(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i shes rab ce na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam la brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pa na/ ci nus su theg pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i chos
172a7(mdo sde): la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la rgyas par ston cing 'chad kyang / de la dmigasu med pa'i spyod pa la gnas te/ mi g.yo ba dang / mi
172a8(mdo sde): rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med pa'i shes rab dang / chags pa med pa'i sems dang / skye ba
172b1(mdo sde): dang 'jog pa med pa'i sems dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sems dang / chos kyi byim
172b2(mdo sde): kyi sems dang / bdag med pa'i sems dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / bzod pa dang / rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis grub pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i
172b3(mdo sde): sa la shim tu thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa mi chags pa'i mchog dam pa'i blo gros kyi sa la thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa ste/ shes rab 'di
172b4(mdo sde): ni len pa med pa la chags pa med pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
172b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'kho ra lo da dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
172b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba
172b7(mdo sde): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
172b8(mdo sde): babs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongs su
173a1(mdo sde): bskul te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyar thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / 
173a2(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyu ro// de la ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'jo
173a3(mdo sde): lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de lta ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i
173a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don nam/ gzhan gyi don nam/ gnyis ga'i don la bdag dang gzhan du
173a5(mdo sde): rdeg cing / bzo dang rgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongasu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 
173a6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / pa dang ma dang / nad pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang rten med pa dang / gnod pa mang pos sdug bsngal
173a7(mdo sde): bar gyur pa mthong na/ shin tu thabs mkhas pas sgrol zhing / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhis sems can yongasu smin par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' de bdag theg pa chen po
173a8(mdo sde): la gnas pas/ nyan thos kyi thag pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / thag pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongasu ma smin pa la/ 
173b1(mdo sde): shin tu phra la zab pa/ dam pa'i chos ston te/ slob tu gzhug pa dang / 'phags pa'i bsam gtan la nan tan byang du gzhug go// gzhan yang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan te/ 
173b2(mdo sde): nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi las bzla zhing mi ltung ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rig par bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhol bar bya ba nas/ 
173b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
173b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / lhag me mi lus pa'i lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bu'i bar du 'jug par bya ba la mkhas pa'i yis
173b5(mdo sde): kyis yongasu smin par byed do// sems can gang kha dang / grags pa dang / longs spyod lags te/ dbang po rgod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ma smin pa la ni/ mdo sde dang / 
173b6(mdo sde): 'dul ba dang / ma mo klog pa 'don pa byed du gzhug pa dang / sangs rgyas gzhan gyis bshad pa las gzhan pa/ rnam par grol ba dang 'thun pa'i gtsug lag klog cing
173b7(mdo sde): 'don du bcug ste/ yongasu smin par byed do// sems can gang sbyin pa byed pa la mi mos pa la ni/ rin po che dang / nor dbyig rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bar bskul bas yongs
173b8(mdo sde): smin par byed // sems can gang gtum pa/ mi nges pa'i rang bzhin can la tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi slob tu bskal ba dang / sems can gang zhe sdang can la bzod pa slob par
174a1(mdo sde): skul ba dang / sems can gang le lo can la ni brtson 'grus slob par skul ba dang / sems can gang sems g.yengs pa la ni bsam gtan sgom par
174a2(mdo sde): skal ba dang / sems can gang 'chal pa'i shes rab can la yang dag pa'i chos ston pas/ bka' lung brda' sprod cing lung 'bog pa la thabs mkhas pas yongasu smin par byed
174a3(mdo sde): sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad cing mi gnas pa la mi spyod pa can la ni/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa
174a4(mdo sde): dang dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa la bslab pa dang / bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa bslab pas yongasu smin par byed do// gzhan yang bzo' dang / rgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gan
174a5(mdo sde): la slob cing spyod du btsud pas yongasu smin par byed/ do// de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye
174a6(mdo sde): shes kyi rnam pa ni klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed pas mang ngo // de ltar yi ge dang / gtsug lag khang dang / bzo dang / rgyu rtsal gyi las kyi gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang / brtson
174a7(mdo sde): 'grus dang / thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes mu stegs can dang / ston pa gzhan la zhugs pa thams cad brtul ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// 
174a8(mdo sde): bangs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ thabs mkhas pa spyod pa'i
174b1(mdo sde): gnas gyur pa/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa lhun gyis grub pas rtog pa med pa/ phyir ldog pa med pa'i chosu gyur pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang ston pa
174b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa la'ang mi sten/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang mi ltos par 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la nan tan byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' nga ni 'jig rten gyi thabs
174b3(mdo sde): mkhas pas rmongs pa yin te/ ngan seng du ltung bar 'gyuraro// de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes la gzhol zhing gnas par yang mi nus la/ 
174b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yino// shin tu thabs mi mkhas pa/ sems can gyi dbang po dang spyod pa'i khyad par yang mi shes la/ shin tu thabs
174b5(mdo sde): mkhas pa la yang rmongs par 'gyur bas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i ngang
174b6(mdo sde): bor ma smin pa dag la theg pa chen po ston pa dang / slob cing nan tan byed du bcugo/ gang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
174b7(mdo sde): kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go// gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod gyur pa'i sems ca
174b8(mdo sde): la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bdugo/ gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni 'khor
175a1(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bde ba dang / dga' bar ston te/ 'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba skyed par mi ston te// gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas/ sems
175a2(mdo sde): can gang srog gcod pa la dga' ba nas/ de bzhin du log par lta ba'i bar du mos pa dag la shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos ston te/ de la 'khor ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ 
175a3(mdo sde): pha rol du skye zhing / sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong la skye zhing 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos spong ba mi ston to// gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas
175a4(mdo sde): pa la rmongs pas/ sems can gang tshul khrims srung bar mos pa la ni sbyin pa spyong du bcugo// sems can gang bzod pa sgom par mos pa la ni bzod pa spong ba ston cing / tshul
175a5(mdo sde): khrims srung du bcugo// sems can gang brtson 'grus rlom bar mos pa la ni brtson 'grus spong ba ston cing / bzod pa spyod du bcug go// sems can gang bsam ga
175a6(mdo sde): sgom par mos pa la ni bsam gtan spong bar ston cing / brtson 'grus la nan tan byed du bcugo// sems can gang shes rab sgom par mos pa la ni shes rab spong ba
175a7(mdo sde): ston cing / bsam gtan sgom du bcugo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la phan pa dang / bde
175a8(mdo sde): ba'i don byed mi nus te/ sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs por gyur to// thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang/ 
175b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar 'jig rten gyi babs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba yin te/ go cha
175b2(mdo sde): chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// 
175b3(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don btang ste/ gzhan gyi don lhur
175b4(mdo sde): byed pas bzo dang / rgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par ston pas/ yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / 
175b5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dang / pa dang / ma la bstan bkur dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / nad pa dang / phongs pa dang / nyam sa thag pa dang / mgon dang skyabs med pa dang / shim
175b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos gzir ba la thabs kyis sgrol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongasu smin par byed/ ci la mos pa dang dbang po dang / sdong ji lta
175b7(mdo sde): ba bzhin du sems can la dam pa'i chos ston to// gzhan yang rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa slob cing / nan tan byed par skul ba dang / rang sangs
175b8(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa ni theg pa chen po slob cing nan tan byed par skul ba dang / gal te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dbang po ma smin pa la ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi chos
176a1(mdo sde): skye ba sten cing / 'khor bas skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba rgol bar sku'o// sems can gang srog gcod pa la mos pa nas/ leg par lta ba'i bar du chags pa
176a2(mdo sde): la dbang po dang / rang ba'in ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos ston pa dang / 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol du skye ba 'di dang / pha rol sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu
176a3(mdo sde): myong ba bstan pa/ mi dge ba'i chos kyis 'jigs pa dang skye ba ston to// kha cig la ni 'an thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos stod do// kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang
176a4(mdo sde): ldan pa'i chas sten te// kha cag la ni bla na mang ba'i chos yang dag pa bstan te// khad kyis slob tu 'jug/ sems can gang sbyin pa lams par gyur pa rnams la de/ tshul khrims
176a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i mchog srung bar ston pa de bzhi na du/ rgyas par sems can gang bsam gtan la mos por gyur pa la ni/ zag pa med pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi
176a6(mdo sde): mchog gis bsdus pa dang / shes rab bla na med pa ston cing nan tan byed du bdug ste/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa ste/ 'dir
176a7(mdo sde): byang rab sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shin
176a8(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa'i ge mtshan pa'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ dod pa rnam lnga yangasu bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// 
176b1(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / 
176b2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigs
176b3(mdo sde): garang bka' stsal pa// thabs mkhas nan ngan rnam gnyis te// 'jig rten bcas dang 'jig rten 'das// chags pa de ni 'jig rten bcas// chags med pa ni 'jig
176b4(mdo sde): rngan 'das// shin tu thabs mkhas nan tan ni// khyad par rnam pa gnyis la gnas// dmigs pa yod pa 'jig rten bcas// dmigs med de ni 'jig
176b5(mdo sde): rten 'das// gang zhig theg pa gcig ston pa// de ni leg par chos stan min// bdag kyang yongasu mi smin na// gzhan gyi don tu ga la 'gyur// gcig tu mi dag sem can
176b6(mdo sde): la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston na// de ni gti mug rmongs pa ste// byang chub chen po de ma yin// theg pa gsapa la 'jug spro zhing // yang dag pa'i chos 'dang la/ 
176b7(mdo sde): 'khor bar spro ba'i chos ston na// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin de ma yin// rtse gcig blo yis rab brtags te// 'dod dang mos pa bzhin nga snga// da ni shin tu thabs mkhas pas
176b8(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams kyi de la bsngags// sems can sdig pa dag spyod kyang // theg pa gsum gyi sgo 'gyur na// dbang po snod bzhin chos bstan te/ sdig pa kun las grol bar byed
177a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po'i go mtshan pa'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
177a2(mdo sde): gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ 'og ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas/ nyan thos dang / 
177a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bstan bkur bya ba
177a4(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// de la ji ltar na byams pa chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang / sen
177a5(mdo sde): la dmigs pa'i byams pa'o// chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni/ byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// sems can la dmigs pa'i byams
177a6(mdo sde): pa ni byams pa chen po'i go cha zhes mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong du gyur pa ste/ 
177a7(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa la nan tan pado// rang sangs rgyas ni bdag zhi ba dang khang/ 
177a8(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / bdag gi sgrib pa bstsal ba dang / bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa gtsang ba'i phyir yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi phyir/ sems can la dmigs
177b1(mdo sde): pa'i byams pas brtson 'grus la nan tan byed pa ni ma yino// de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes mi bya ste/ go cha chen po ma yino// chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa
177b2(mdo sde): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / thun mong ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' shig gis nan tan byed nus par 'gyuraro// byad
177b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa 'di la nan tan
177b4(mdo sde): bye// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i yongasu mya ngan la bzla ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa yongasu gcad pa'i phyir/ 
177b5(mdo sde): shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan de do// de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bya
177b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pa ni phung po la mi gnas/ skye mtshad la mi gnas/ khams la mi gnas/ dran pa 'bar gzhag pa rnams la rma
177b7(mdo sde): gnas pa nas/ byang chub kyi lam gyi yan lag gi bar du mi gnaso// 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams la mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 
177b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas/ tshu rol gyi mu la mi gnas/ pha rol gyi mu la mi gnas/ dmigs pa la mi gnas/ mi dmigs pa la mi gnas/ de
178a1(mdo sde): lngar byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa'i sa las yin
178a2(mdo sde): tu 'das te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa chen po'i go ma chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
178a3(mdo sde): po gang byams pa chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongasu bskul te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yin
178a4(mdo sde): tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang // bsrung
178a5(mdo sde): ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyu ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i pi tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa// nyan thos dang ni rang rgya
178a6(mdo sde): ba/ sems can dmigs pa'i byams sgom pa// sems la bcu gsum skyon 'chang zhing // bdag la phan pa'i don phyir rtsol// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni// sems can
178a7(mdo sde): thams cad kun gyi phyir// thun mong ma yin byams chen bsgoms// bcu gsum sems kyi skyon rnams spangs// dri ma bcu gsum rab spangs nas// byang chub chen por gzhol bar bya
178a8(mdo sde): chos la dmigs pa'i byams bsgoms na// bsod nams zhing grub ring ba min// bcu gsum stobs la bde gnas na// sems can kun las shin tu 'phags// ji ltar seng ge'i
178b1(mdo sde): rgyal po de// ri dgas kun las 'phags pa bzhin// bcu gsum dgra rnams shin tu btul// rtag dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin spangs// sems la cis kyang mi gos na// myur du byang chub chen pa
178b2(mdo sde): 'thob// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i go ma chen po'i 'khor lo yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo'i
178b3(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyen thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
178b4(mdo sde): bsed nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyuraro// de ji lta zhe na/ nyan
178b5(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ snying rje la skyed kyi/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi
178b6(mdo sde): phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yino// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag 'ba' shig la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yin gyi sems
178b7(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skye // de bas na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ nyan thos dang / 
178b8(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin/ tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
179a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrang ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde
179a2(mdo sde): ba'i don gyi phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs smin par byed do// snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pas yongasu bsdad ba ni
179a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / nor dang / dbyig dang / theg pa dang / bran dang / las byed pa'i mi dang yul dang / srid dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / lus dang / srog gi bar du yongasu gtong ba la ser
179a4(mdo sde): sna med/ mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa la sbyor bas 'dul ba'i sems can yod par mi mthong / sbyin pa byed par mi mthong / len par mi mthong / nor gyi dngos por mi mthong / sbyin pa spyod
179a5(mdo sde): bar mi mthong / sbyin pa byas pa'i 'bras bur mi mthong ba na mi dmigs pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po skye // sems can thams cad la phan pa dang
179a6(mdo sde): bde ba'i don gyi phyir ngag bstan pa don bsgrub pa dang / don 'thun pas ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du/ mi dmigs pa yang mi mthong ba'i bar du de dang des rgyas par ston cing 'chad do// 
179a7(mdo sde): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu mchog dam pa'i dul ba'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / tshad med pa'i sems dang / phung po dang / kham dang / 
179a8(mdo sde): skye mched thams cad la mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sems kyis/ gang nas gang du skyes kyang g.yo ba med pa dang / mi gnas pa'i snying rje chen po'i 'khor lo 'dis snod gyur pa'i
179b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pa la skyo ba med// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
179b2(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ba ma yino// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang snying rje chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na// thog ma sems bskyed pa
179b3(mdo sde): nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yin tu 'das shing / nyan thos
179b4(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi the ga pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang
179b5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad bka' stsal pa// shimang zang mo dam pa'i
179b6(mdo sde): chos dag / snying rje chen po'i gzhir ni de 'gyur// shin tu dpag dka' na mkha' 'dra ste// gnas pa me do gzugs kyang med de// byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen pa
179b7(mdo sde): yon tan chen po dang ni ldan te// rgyal ba'i ye shes snying rje chen pos// dpa' bo 'jig rten 'da' bar nges 'gyur// mgon dang skyabs med sems can dag ni// 'khor
179b8(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal rnyog pas bcings pa// snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus te// sems can rnam par grol bar byed de// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje skyed pa// 'jo
180a1(mdo sde): ba'i rgya mtsho skems par byed de// nyan thos theg pa'i 'khor rnams dang ni// rang rgyal theg pa spyod pas ma yin/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems
180a2(mdo sde): ngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba// snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus te// sdug bsngal kun las grol bar byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
180a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po// tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa// tshang med pa mtha' yas pa/ shin tu rgya chen po dang ldan pa/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi
180a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad te/ ting 'dzin rnams dang / ga zungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa chen po'i ge cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' se
180a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na// thog ma sems bskyed nas// 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bsu la te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin
180a6(mdo sde): tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung
180a7(mdo sde): ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyu ro// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ 
180a8(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa/ shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i la
180b1(mdo sde): lo gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la shin tu rtog pa ni/ ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis nam mkha' kun tu khyab pa bzhin du/ sems
180b2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ rten pa med pa/ mi gnas pa/ gos pa med pa'i ting 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sems kyi spyod med pa
180b3(mdo sde): mig dang gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyis rnam par zhen pa dang bral ba/ sems kyi spyod pa med pa las/ mig gi 'dus te
180b4(mdo sde): reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba rnam gsum skyes te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rab tu na
180b5(mdo sde): zhing chags pa med// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
180b6(mdo sde): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
180b7(mdo sde): pa dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par sems pa dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa thams
180b8(mdo sde): cad rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa mdo// sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa las skyes pa'i tshe re ba rnam gsum ste/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin// 
181a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa mdo// dus gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rnam pa thang
181a2(mdo sde): len pa med pa sems kyi spyod pa med pa'o// gang ji snyed khams gsum dang / 'du byed gsum dang / reg bya gsum dang / tshor ba gsum dang / dbang po gsum dang / theg pa gsum
181a3(mdo sde): dang / sdom pa gsum dang / rnam par grol ba gsum dang / rnam pa de dag thams cad la sems rab tu zhi ba/ gnas pa med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ len pa med pas mnyam pa
181a4(mdo sde): nyid du gnas// gang ji snyed sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la sems kyi sgo
181a5(mdo sde): pa med pa/ rab tu zhi bar gan so// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / 
181a6(mdo sde): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang sems kyis spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gan so// gang ji snyed dgu mthar gyis
181a7(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa la yang sems kyis spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnaso// gzhan yang mngon par 'du byed pa gsum dang / chos la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang
181a8(mdo sde): lam gyi yan lag dang / lam gyi rang bzhin 'dren par byed pa dag la yang len pa med pa sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / kun bzhi rnam par shes
181b1(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa dang / nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang / rke bar len pa med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa meng pa dang / tshu rol gyi su dang / pha rol gyi mu dang / chung dang
181b2(mdo sde): bo dang / tshad med pa dang / byed pa dang / mi byed pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du mi ston pa thams cad kyi rnam pa la sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas// gang ji
181b3(mdo sde): snyeng byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can smin par byed pa nas/ bsrung bar bya ba med pa gsum dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
181b4(mdo sde): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du chos thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa/ sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnaso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
181b5(mdo sde): chen po dag 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis tshor ba rnam gsum gyi nyes pa yongasu bsal ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongasu zhi ba dang / mtshan ma'i chos
181b6(mdo sde): yongasu spong ba 'gyu ro// gzhan yang ji snyed na mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang 'dren par 'gyur
181b7(mdo sde): te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo de la gnas pas/ gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa
181b8(mdo sde): dang / 'gro ba rnams 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma lus par yongasu bstsal te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong bar byed// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 
182a1(mdo sde): mun pa nag pos na mkha' thams cad yog pa na/ nyi ma yar ba'i tshe/ mun pa thams cad sel bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang
182a2(mdo sde): dag par rig pa na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya chen po dang ldan pas/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting 'dzin rnams
182a3(mdo sde): dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i brjod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang grub cing 'dran par yang 'gyu ro// gzhan yang na mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting 'dzin rnams
182a4(mdo sde): dang gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas pas/ dpag tu med pa na mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi mas phyin ci log bzhi'i mun pa yongs
182a5(mdo sde): bsal te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams 'khor ba
182a6(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par ya ngasu sel te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar mi bya'o// gzhan yang de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
182a7(mdo sde): la dbang thob pa dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs pa'i dbang du ni mi 'gro zhing rje su mi spyad pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chu
182a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang / mi 'bral ba dang / chos bris pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mi 'bras
182b1(mdo sde): ba dang yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad/ rtag tu sangs rgyas rje su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni rlung ngu na rmi lam du yang ba
182b2(mdo sde): med par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pas/ na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ 
182b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad/ ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa go
182b4(mdo sde): chen po'i 'khor lo 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po na sa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa
182b5(mdo sde): dang ra mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin la
182b6(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ ting 'dzin 'di la gnas na/ tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed gsum po yongasu bcad/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang / g.yo ba'i sems kyi spyod pa
182b7(mdo sde): med pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun gcod par 'gyuraro// ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na zhag gcig gam/ zhag
182b8(mdo sde): bdun gyi bar du bsamo gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin de las langs na yang sems rab tu zhi ba len pa med cing lhan ner gnas par 'gyuro// gzhan yang dad
183a1(mdo sde): nga'i mthas gtugs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhago// ting 'dzin de la gnas na/ sems rab tu mnyam pas ra mkha' ltar chags pa med pa
183a2(mdo sde): lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun nas zil dngar gyi thigs pas skar ma lta bu mngon par byung bas/ kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings pa'i yengasu gdung ba thams cad sel bar 'gyuraro// 
183a3(mdo sde): ting 'dzin de las langs nas/ yang dag pa'i dran pa thob ste/ dga' ba khang par can gyis lus la khyab par gyur pa ni ji ltar lha'i sras po dbang phyug chen po bde ba'i tingange 'dzin
183a4(mdo sde): la 'jug na/ lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun nas rab tu bde ba myong bzhin/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lus la bde ba reg pa sangs rgyas rjesu dran par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rje su dra
183a5(mdo sde): pas sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan ma gzhan mthong ba mdo// byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe sangs rgyas gag yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas gcig mthong ngo // 
183a6(mdo sde): gal te sangs rgyas mang po yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas mang po mthong // gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku rung bar yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chung du mthong // gal te sangs rgyas
183a7(mdo sde): kyi sku chen por yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por mthong // gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par mthong // gal te
183a8(mdo sde): bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na/ bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong // gal te gzhan
183b1(mdo sde): gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur yid la byas na gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo // gal te sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa
183b2(mdo sde): dang ji snyed gzugasu gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na/ sems can dang sems can ma yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugs gtogs pa
183b3(mdo sde): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong gi// gzugasu me mthong // byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe yang 'di snyam du chos thams cad dang / gardza ba
183b4(mdo sde): ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pas bdag gis tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed gsum la sogs pa cho sa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcod snyam
183b5(mdo sde): nas/ 'geg pa'i ting 'dzin la snyems par zhug so// ti 'a dzi na de la gnas nas blo sngon du btang ba bzhin du thams cad yongasu bcad// tingange 'dzin gyi ro'i zas kyis 'a
183b6(mdo sde): gal te zhag bdun nam/ zhag bdun gnyis sam/ bdun gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam/ brgyad ngam/ gal ta na bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig
183b7(mdo sde): brgya stong gi bar du ci nu su gnas te/ ting 'dzin gyi zas za'o// ting 'dzin de las langs nas/ sems rab tu zhi bas ci la yang mi chags te bde bar gnaso// gal te don dam pa
183b8(mdo sde): mthas gtugs pa'i ting 'dzin du zhugs na yang sngar ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan pa yid la bya ba nas/ chos thams cad dang gzugs thams cad
184a1(mdo sde): sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i bar du chud par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig so so yang dag par
184a2(mdo sde): pa na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa mtha' yas pa/ yengs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pa/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
184a3(mdo sde): thams cad dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ namakha'
184a4(mdo sde): mig dang / spyi bo'i ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs thams cad lhag ma ma lus par spangs te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu len par mi bye'o// gzhan yang re/ 
184a5(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mes 'dzag pa 'byung / nye ba na/ nyi ma lnga cig car shar te/ 'jig rten gyi kha mas na rdzing bu dang / rdzing chen po dang / 'bab nu
184a6(mdo sde): 'bab chu chen po dang / mtsho dang / mtsho chen po'i chu rnams lhag ma ma lus par thams cad skems par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag po
184a7(mdo sde): rig pa/ na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad/ ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams
184a8(mdo sde): dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang mngon par 'dren to// gzhan yang na mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la zab
184b1(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la yang gnas shing 'dren par 'gyu ro// gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / 
184b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams la 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongasu skams te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed// gzhan
184b3(mdo sde): yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten chu yis 'jig pa 'byung ba na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khams rlung gling chen po bzhi dang / gling phran ba
184b4(mdo sde): dang / ri rab ri'i rgyal po dang / ri bran thams cad chus bkrus te/ zhig nas/ lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// de bzhi nadu byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig sa so yang
184b5(mdo sde): dag par rig pa/ na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pa/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi ches thams cad / dengange 'dzin rnam pa
184b6(mdo sde): gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang 'grub cing 'dren par 'gyu ro// na mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la
184b7(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas shing / 'dren par 'gyur bas/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyar te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa
184b8(mdo sde): dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnamasu 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las la mkhas pa'i go mchen po'i 'khor lo yang gnas par 'gyuraro// 'khor lo 'di la gnas pas dpag
185a1(mdo sde): / tu med pa na mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi ma byung bas/ rang gi lus la byin ci log bzhi dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad yongs sel bar 'gyuro// 'das pa'i
185a2(mdo sde): kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnamasu 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lu
185a3(mdo sde): par yongs sel te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang myong bar mi byed// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems
185a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rab sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams
185a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg/ pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnye/ bkur byed par 'gyuro// 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis
185a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'dral
