185a7(mdo sde): zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'brel ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang
185a8(mdo sde): mi 'bral ba dang / yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms te/ mngon par byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni/ rlung du
185b1(mdo sde): rmil pa na yang 'bral bar mi byed// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyang yongs rdzogs pa dang / ring po mi thogs par rnam par dag par
185b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sems can thams cad kyang rdzus te skye ba mtshan ma dang / 
185b3(mdo sde): gzugs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba/ nyon mongs pa srab cing chung ba/ theg pa chen po la bde bar gnas pa sha sta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag
185b4(mdo sde): gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag/ nyon mongs thams cad yongasu gard par bya// yang dag stong pa nyid la
185b5(mdo sde): sems zhugs na// dngos po gang yang bya bar dka' ba men/ srid pa'i bcings pa thams cad gcad pa'i phyir/ snyoms par 'jug la nan tan brtson par bya/ 
185b6(mdo sde): ting 'dzin yon tan dag dang ldan pas na// gdon mi za bar dpag ka'i shes rab 'thob// gzugs med pa'i bsam gtan rab sgom zhing // 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin stong pa nyid
185b7(mdo sde): brtags na// sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo mchog rab skye ste// sdig pa thams cad yongasu zad 'gyuraro// yong dang med pa'i chos rnams thams cad ni// yang dag stong pa nyid du brtag
185b8(mdo sde): pas bcom// ngan par 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams yongs bsal nas// rtag tu sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur// yang dag stong pa nyid la rab sgom pas// dge ba'i chos
186a1(mdo sde): gzhan kun la brtson bya ste// sangs rgyas thams cad kun la rab mchod na// myur du sangs rgyas 'bras bu bab par 'gyur// sems can kun gyi dge pa'i thugs
186a2(mdo sde): bya ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yi nang bsal na// rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du myur du skye// mngon par 'tshang rgya byang chub chen po 'thob// sangs rgyas mtshan dang ldan pa'i sem can
186a3(mdo sde): ngag sangs rgyas zhing der yongasu gang bar 'gyur// thams cad sangs rgyas thog la 'dun pa ste/ nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa yongasu spong // 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen pos
186a4(mdo sde): snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las/ bsod nams kyi zhing gi mtshan nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos chen po'i rnams
186a5(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs su
186a6(mdo sde): dran pa la goms pa dag/ deng 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa la nan tan bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad pa thos nas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i tingange 'dzin gyi sgo ma
186a7(mdo sde): thob bo// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams chos 'di thos nas/ tingange 'dzin gyis 'tsho ba me tog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo mo thams cad tho'o// gas
186a8(mdo sde): yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas dpa' bar 'gro ba glog gi 'od la rten pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo mo thams cad thob
186b1(mdo sde): gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ chos la sgyur ba 'od snang ba la rten par byed pa rje su 'thun pa'i bzod pa tham ca
186b2(mdo sde): thob bo// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ rdul dang dri ma dang bral te/ chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa skyes te/ 
186b3(mdo sde): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ lan cig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu tho'o// gzha
186b4(mdo sde): ying sems can chang med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ lan cig phyir mi ldo ga pa'i 'bras bu tho'o// gzhan yang sems can tshad med
186b5(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ mchog gi dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob// sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
186b6(mdo sde): babang pa thos nas/ khams gsum gyi brtson ra nas 'byung bar rtsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das la brtan cing rab tu byung bas yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par gyur to// 
186b7(mdo sde): gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas shing / nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed pas phyir mi ldog
186b8(mdo sde): par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ rnam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ba bar gnas
187a1(mdo sde): nas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed pa las phyir me ldeg par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can chad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa
187a2(mdo sde): thos nas/ nam 'tsho ba'i bar du dag pa bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas nas/ theg pa chen por sems bskyed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
187a3(mdo sde): ldog par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ 'jig rten gyi yang dag par lta ba thob par gyur te/ yang dag par
187a4(mdo sde): lta ba de'i dbang gis ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / na nas zhen mongs pa'i las dang // nyor mongs pa thams cang byang nas/ mthe risu 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / yang dag pa'i sman
187a5(mdo sde): lam dang / dge ba'i las thams cad skye zhing 'phel bar gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ dkon
187a6(mdo sde): mchog gsum la skyabasu song ste/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa blangs nas/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la spro ba dang / chos thos pa la dga' ba dang / dge 'dun gyi g.yeg byed pa la med
187a7(mdo sde): te/ nyin mtshan du 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus la sems par tshad med par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas// 
187a8(mdo sde): log pa la phyogs pa dang / blo gros ngan pa dang / las ngan pa thams cad yongasu spangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi 'gyur ba'i dad pa 'thob nas/ khyim na gnas pa'i chos mangs su
187b1(mdo sde): spangs te/ rnam par dag pas rab tu byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig
187b2(mdo sde): kyi bu ngas sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba brda sbed pa chen po chos kyi sgo mo 'di khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis khyod kyis gzungasu zung la shin tu rgyas par gyis shig/ sems can
187b3(mdo sde): gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la klog gam/ 'don tam/ yid la byed dam/ gzhan la rgya cher 'chad dam/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la khyed kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcus
187b4(mdo sde): bsrungs te/ yun ring por phan pa dang / bde ba'i don thob par gyis shig/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i thabs dang bdog pa'i nor thams cad bsrungs te/ nyams par mi bya ba dang / gnad
187b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad las bsrungs te/ gnod pa med par bya ba dang / log par lta ba dang / log par phyogs pa las bsrungs te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spangs par
187b6(mdo sde): ba dang / de'i lus la gnod pa thams cad bsrungs te/ med par bya ba dang / 'phya ba dang / skur ba thams cad las ba srungs te/ med par bya ba dang tshul khrims dang / spyod pa ba
187b7(mdo sde): nyams par mi 'gyur bar bsrungs pa dang / de la mi ma yin pa thams cad dang / 'byung ba chen po 'khrugs pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i nang dang / rga ba thams cad yongasu sel
187b8(mdo sde): srung ba dang / de la dus ma yin pa/ tshul ma yin pa/ ltas ngan dang / rims thams cad mi 'byung bar srung ba dang / de la 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na yang / sangs rgyas thams cad
188a1(mdo sde): mthong bar srung ba dang / de tshe 'phos nas kyang bde 'gror skye ba dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i don theb par yongasu bsrung bar byed// rigs kyi bu sems can gang ches kyi rna
188a2(mdo sde): grangs 'di klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / don yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher 'chang ngam/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la/ khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bsus shin tu bsrang
188a3(mdo sde): zhing byin gyis brlabs te/ chos rnam pa 'di bcus yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das
188a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// de de bzhi 'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzungasu 'dzin cing / shin tu rgyas par bgyi'o// sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang
188a5(mdo sde): la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / don yid la bgyid pa dang / pha rol po la rgya cher ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la/ bdag gis chos rnam pa 'deb
188a6(mdo sde): shin tu bsrungs te/ yun pa ring por phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di gsungs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems
188a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
188a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rigs par the tsom 'dri ba dang / tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte
188b1(mdo sde): 'bru chen pa dang / sa dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa 'khor mang ba thams cang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o// 'das pa chen po las// byang chub sems dpa
188b2(mdo sde): sa'i sring pa'i 'khor lo bcu pa las/ bde ba'i don 'thob pa yongasu gdams pa zhes bya ba rdzog ste// ban+d+he rnam par mi rtogs pas rgya las sbyar ba'o// 
188b3(mdo sde): mdo 'di sa dgas cad kyis gtan lam bab pa'i 'gyur ning bzhig gang // / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ta thA ga ta gar+b+he nA ma ma hA yAn sA / 
188b4(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 'di sa
188b5(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lo bcu bzhes pa dang / shin tu tsha ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rgyal po'i khab na/ 
188b6(mdo sde): bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la rin po che'i gdugs kyi khang bzangs tsan dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i nyin thos kyi dge slong 'bum du chang ba
188b7(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po phal cher dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dadang dang ldan par 'gyur ba/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin
188b8(mdo sde): grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas @
189a1(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu sen pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'ang srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'o/ 
189a2(mdo sde): srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu bo 'od srung dang / tsha dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan
189a3(mdo sde): pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tsha dang ldan pa dag dbang dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
189a4(mdo sde): chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa cang shes ke'u di n+ya dang / tshe dang wa na pa 'char ka dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin dang / tsha dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang / tsha
189a5(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong 'bum du tshang ba dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi
189a6(mdo sde): zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/ gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ sa
189a7(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ gang dag gi ming thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams
189a8(mdo sde): tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems da
189b1(mdo sde): chen po chos kyi blo gros dang / seng+ge'i blo gros dang / stag gi blo gros dang / don gyi blo gros dang / rin po che'i blo gros dang / rab mchog blo gros dang / zla 'od dang / rin chen zla 'od dang / zla ba nya
189b2(mdo sde): ba'i 'od dang / rnam par gnon pa chen po dang / rnam par gnon pa dpag med dang / rnam par gnon pa mtha' yas dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnan dang / mi g.yo ba'i gnas
189b3(mdo sde): rnam par gnon dang / mthu chen thob dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / spos kyi glang po dang / spos dga' dang / spos dga' ba'i dpal dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying
189b4(mdo sde): dang tog dang / tog chen po dang / tog dri ma med pa dang / rin chen mtha' yas dbyu gu dang / rin chen dbyu gu 'dor dang / rin chen dri med dbyu gu dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po
189b5(mdo sde): dang rtag tu rab dga' dang / lag na rin po che dang / namakha'i mdzod dang / ri bo dang / r-i rab dang / ri bo chen po dang / yon tan rin chen snang dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi
189b6(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / sa 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi nang sel dang / rab tu yid dga' dang / yid skyo dang / skyo med dang / 'od byed dang / tsan dan dang / g.yo ba zlog dang / dpag me mang
189b7(mdo sde): bsgrags dbyangs dang / byang chub kun nas bslang dang / mthong ba don yod dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 
189b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+ge'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed dang / yang thabs gcigo// lha dang / klu dang / gnod
190a1(mdo sde): / sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dpag tu med pa dang yang thabs gcigo/ de nas bcom
190a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / grong rdal ba dang / yul
190a3(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas shing mchod ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol ba'i 'og tu tsan ngan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa de'i
190a4(mdo sde): yang dag 'jog la zhugs par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tsan dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa de las pad+ma mngab ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum
190a5(mdo sde): yod pa/ chang shing rta'i 'angang lo tsam pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ kha ma bye ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum byung bar gyur te/ de dag steng gi na mkha'i bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ 
190a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khebs par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rin po che'i bla re bzhin du kun tu gnas par gyur to// pad+ma'i snying po re re la yang de bzhin gshegs
190a7(mdo sde): pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu snang la/ pad+ma de dag thams cad kyang shin tu kha bye bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
190a8(mdo sde): rlabs kyis/ pad+ma de dag gi mngab ma de dag thams cad kyang mog mog po dang / nog nog po dang / dri nga ba dang / smad par 'os pa dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin par gyur
190b1(mdo sde): to// 'on kyang pad+ma'i snying po de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams skyil mo krung bcas te/ bzhugs shing / 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu sna // de bzhin gsheg
190b2(mdo sde): ba'i pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab par gyur te/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to// 
190b3(mdo sde): nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / 'khor bzhi yang shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dadum
190b4(mdo sde): pa de mthong nas the tshom du gyur to// gang pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'di dag gi 'dab ma rnams 'di ltar kha dog ngan cing chung ba rnams kyang kha dog ngan la smad pa'i 'os gyu
190b5(mdo sde): te/ mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang / pad+ma'i snying po de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'i sku re re skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zer 'du
190b6(mdo sde): dag rab tu 'gyed pas shin tu mdzes par kun tu snang ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang yin/ rkyen ni gang yin snya mo// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / 'khor ba na
190b7(mdo sde): bo the tshom du gyur pa rnams 'dong bar bya ba'i mtshan ma byaso// de'i tshe tsan dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros shes bya
190b8(mdo sde): ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos can gyi ga
191a1(mdo sde): las rtsoms te/ de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yongasu zhu bar spobs par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sem
191a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gres/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 
191a3(mdo sde): 'khor bzhi po dag gi the tshom gyi zug rngu rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad pad+ma kha dog ngan cing dri
191a4(mdo sde): mi bda' ba 'di lta bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'di dag gis khebs pa dang / de dag gi dbus na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyel me krung bcas shing bcu
191a5(mdo sde): te/ 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu gda' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag mthong nas kyang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum tha
191a6(mdo sde): mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal ba'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje blo gros kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas
191a7(mdo sde): stong phrag bye ba mi g.yo bar// pad+ma dag gi dbus na bzhugs par ni// khyed kyis 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston mdzad pa// bdag gi sngan chad nam yang 'di ma mthong // 'od zer stong
191a8(mdo sde): rnams rab tu 'gyed mdzad cing // sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad khebs par mdzad// ngo mtshar chos kyi rnams rol mdzad pa'i// 'dren pa rnams kyis bar chad ma mchis mdzes
191b1(mdo sde): mdab ma dag dang chu ba smad 'os la// kha dog ngan pa'i pad+ma rnams dbus der// de dag rimachen rang bzhin 'drar bzhugs pa// ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul 'di dag sbrul// bdag gis sa
191b2(mdo sde): rgyas gang+gA'i bye snyed mthong // de yi rdzu 'phrul khyad 'phags bdag mthong ste// de ring gda' ba'i rnam sprul ci 'dra ba// sngon chad nam yang 'di 'dra 'di ma mthong // rkang gnyis gtso ba
191b3(mdo sde): lhas ni bstan du gsol// rgyu gang rkyen gang lags pa bshadu gsol// 'jig rten don mdzad thugs brtse gsung du gsel// lus can kun gyi the tshom dgum du gsol// de nas bcom
191b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
191b5(mdo sde): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ma do shin tu rgyas pa yod/ de rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de ba zhen gshegs pas snang ba'i mtshan ma 'di lta bu 'di byaso// 
191b6(mdo sde): de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshe
191b7(mdo sde): des bcom ldan 'das la lag so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag ji ltar de bzhi
191b8(mdo sde): gshegs pas sprul pa'i pad+ma kha dog ngan pa/ dri nga ba/ smad par 'os pa/ mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa/ gzugs
192a1(mdo sde): / bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa dag pad+ma'i snying po 'di dag la skyil me krung bcas shing 'khod/ 'od zar 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed cing 'khang pa de dag kyang rig nas/ lha dang mi
192a2(mdo sde): rnams pag 'tshal zhing / mched pa'i las kyang byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang / rang gi shes/ 
192a3(mdo sde): rab dang / ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis sems can sreg chags gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa
192a4(mdo sde): bye ba phrag 'bum gyi skyabasu gyur pa thams cad dang / rigs kyi bu dag sems can nyon mongs pa'i sbub su gyur pa de dag gi nang na/ nga 'dra bar ye shes dang ldan pa/ reg da
192a5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'khod ci skyil me krung bcas nas/ mi g.yo bar 'khod pa mthong ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa sa
192a6(mdo sde): gyur pa de dag gi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mi g.yo zhing / srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa dag mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni nga dang
192a7(mdo sde): 'dra'o zhes smra'o// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sman ni de ltas mdzes pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan des sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pA/ 
192a8(mdo sde): snying por mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu lha'i mig can la la zhig gis/ lha'i mig gis 'di ltar kha dog ngan cing / 'di ltar dri nga ba'i pad+ma 'a ma
192b1(mdo sde): bye zhing ma gyes pa dag la bams te/ de'i dbus na pad+ma'i sring pa la de bzhin gshegs pa skyil ma krung bcas shing 'dug par mams// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs pas pa
192b2(mdo sde): de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de yang dag par sbyangs pa'i phyir/ pad+ma'i mdab ma kha dog ngan cing dri nga la/ smad par 'os pa de dag 'byed cing sel ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu dag
192b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por mthong nas/ sems can de dag gi 'dod rags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug da
192b4(mdo sde): srid pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyen mongs pa'i sbubs dbye ba'i phyir ches ston te/ de sgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yang dag pa nyid du gnas// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni chos rnams
192b5(mdo sde): kyi chos nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung // ma byung yang rung / sems can 'di dag ni rtag/ tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can yin na/ rigs kyi bu
192b6(mdo sde): dge smang par 'os pa'i nyen mongs pa'i sbubs rnams kyis yog pas/ de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i sbungs gzhig pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang yengs sbyang ba'i phyir/ 
192b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos stan te/ bya ba 'di la yang mes par byed // de la byang chub sems
192b8(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de dag la mngon par brtson par gnas pa de dag gang gi tshe/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye bar nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar gyur pa
193a1(mdo sde): tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i grangs 'gre ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba thams cad kyang ba/ 
193a2(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar pad+ma smad par 'os gyur pa// de'i mdab ma sbubs gyur ma gyes la// de bzhin gshogs
193a3(mdo sde): pa'i snying po ma gos te// mi 'ga' la las lha yi mig gis mthong // de ni de'i mngab ma 'byed pa na// dbus na rgyal ba'i sku ni mthong gyur nas// rgyal ba nye ba'i nyon mongs
193a4(mdo sde): phyir mi 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin ngas kyang srog chags thams cad kyi// dkyil der gnas pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyi lus// ji ltar
193a5(mdo sde): smad 'os pad+ma'i sbubs 'dra ba'i// nyon mong stong phrag bya bas khebs pa mthong // nga yang dadag gi ni bsal ba'i phyir// mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu chos
193a6(mdo sde): ston te// sems can 'di dag sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes// rgyal ba'i phyir ni nyon mongs rnam par sbyong // nga yi sangs rgyas spyan ni de 'dra ste// nga yis rgyal ba'i lusu gam/ 
193a7(mdo sde): pa yi/ sems can 'di dag thams cad mthong gyur te// de dag rnam par sbyang phyir chos smra'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na// sbrang tshang zlum po shing gi
193a8(mdo sde): yal ga la 'phya ba// bung ba 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs shing // sbrang rtsis yongasu gang ba zhig yod la// de nas sbrang rtsi 'dod pa'i mi zhig gis srog chags kyi rnam
193b1(mdo sde): pa bung ba de dag thabs mkhas pas bskrad nas/ sbrang rtsi des sbrang rtsi'i bya ba byed// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang sbrang tshang dang 'dra ste/ de la
193b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyis shin tu bsrungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong bas rig/ rigs kyi bu
193b3(mdo sde): ngag ji ltar sbrang tshang gi nang na/ sbrang rtsi bung ba bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs pa yod par skyes bu mkhas pa zhig gis shes pas rig pa de bzhin du/ sen
193b4(mdo sde): thams cad la yang sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu srungs pa yod par de bzhin gshegs pa
193b5(mdo sde): ye shes mthong bas rig ste/ rigs kyi bu ngag de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang thabs la mkhas pas bung ba bsal ba de bzhin du sems can de dag gi
193b6(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / brag dog dang / ser sna la sogs pa'i
193b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams bsal nas/ ji ltar sems can de dag la yang nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag gis nye ba'i
193b8(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ba dang / gnod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba de rnam par spangs nas/ 'jig
194a1(mdo sde): / rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed/ rigs kyi bu dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan yongasu dag pa des/ ngas sems can thams cad de ltar mthong // de nas pa
194a2(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal te// ji ltar 'di na sbrang tshang yod pa la// bung bas kun tu bsrungs shing sbas gyur pa// mi gang sbrang rtsi 'dod pas de mthong
194a3(mdo sde): ma/ de ni bung ba rab tu skyed par byed// de bzhin 'dir yang sbrang tshang lta bu ni// srid pa gsum gyi sems can thams cad do// de dag nyon mongs bye ba mang ba ste// nyon mongs dbus na
194a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs 'dug mthong // nga yang sangs rgyas rnam par spyang don tu// bung ba skrod pa lta bur nyen mongs so la// gang gis nyon mongs bye ba gnod 'gyur ba// chos rnams
194a5(mdo sde): 'dir ni thabs kyis rab ston te// de dag ji ltar de bzhin gshegs gyur la// 'jig rten kun tu bya ba byed 'gyur cing // spobs ldan ji ltar sbrang ma'i sdang rtsi yi/ snang
194a6(mdo sde): 'dra'i chos ston 'gyur bar bya phyiro// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bras sa lu 'am/ nas sam/ ci na 'am/ 'bru rnams ni snying po bub mas yongasu bsrungs pa
194a7(mdo sde): yin te/ de rang gi phub ma las ma byung gi bar du bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba'i bya ba mi byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang dag bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sog
194a8(mdo sde): bzas skom gyi bya ba 'dod pa de dag gis brngas shing brdungs te/ phub ma'i sbubs dang byi shun sel to// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
194b1(mdo sde): spyan gyi sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid/ sangs rgyas nyid rang byung nyid/ nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pas dkris shing gnas par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu ngas
194b2(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa yang nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pa bsal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongasu srung ba dang / sems can 'di dag ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i sbubs
194b3(mdo sde): kyi shun pa thams cad las grol te/ 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i grangasu 'gyur snyam nas/ sems can rnams
194b4(mdo sde): la ches ston to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar 'bru 'am sa lu'i 'bras kyang rung // ci tse 'am ni 'on te nas kyang rung / 
194b5(mdo sde): ji srid bar du de dag phub bcas pa// de srid bar du bya ba mi byed// de dag gis ni brdungs nas phub bsal na/ bya ba rnam pa mang po dag kyang byed// snying po phub ma ldan pa de
194b6(mdo sde): ngag ni// sems can rnams la bya ba mi byed// de bzhin sems can kun gyis sangs rgyas sa// nyon mongs rnams kyis khebs par ngas mthong nas// ngas ni de dag rnam par spang ba dang
194b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas myur thob bya phyir chos ston to// sems can kun la nga 'dra'i chos nyid ni// nyon mongs brgya yis dkris nas gang yod pa// de ni rnam sbyangs thams dang ji lta ngur/ 
194b8(mdo sde): rgyal bar myur 'gyur bya phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ rul pa dang / nyal nyil gyi gnas bshang gdi dri mi zhim pas kun tu gang ba zhig tu mi
195a1(mdo sde): gzhan gseb lam nas song ba zhig gis gser gyi gar bu zlum po zhig lhung bar gyur la/ ba shang gci dring bas kun tu gang ba/ rul pa dang / zhal nyil gyis
195a2(mdo sde): der mi gtsang ba gzhan dang / gzhan dag gis brnan pas/ bltar mi snang bar gyur cing der de lo bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ lo brgya 'am/ 
195a3(mdo sde): lo stong du mi gtsang bas chud mi za ba'i chos can de sems can gang la yang phan pa mi byed// rigs kyi bu dge de nas lhas lha'i mig gis gser gyi gar bu zlum po de la blta
195a4(mdo sde): nas/ mi zhig la kye mi khyod song la 'di ni/ rin po che'i mchog gser rul pa dang / nyal nyil gyi rnam pas non pa de byi dor gyis la gser gyi bya ba gyis shig ces bsgon
195a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag rul pa dang / nyal nyil gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig bla dag so/ gser gyi gar bu zhes bya ba de ni chud mi za ba'i chos
195a6(mdo sde): can gyi tshig bla dag so// lhas lha'i mig ces bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dag so// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de
195a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid chud mi za ba yod pa'i nyon mongs
195a8(mdo sde): pa rul pa dang / 'angam rdzab lta bu rnams bsal ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 
195b1(mdo sde): ji ltar mi yi gser gyi gar bu ni// nyal nyil rnam pa'i nang du lhung gyur la// dar de lo ni mi nyung ba zhig tu// de ltar gnas kyang mi 'jig chos can// lha yis lha yi mig gis de
195b2(mdo sde): mthong nas// rnam par sbyang phyir gzhan la smras pa ni// 'di na rin chen mchog gi gser yod pa// rnam par sbyongs la des ni bya ba gyis// de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad
195b3(mdo sde): kyang / nyon mongs rnams kyi yun ring rtag non mthong // de dag gi ni blo bur nyon mongs shes// rang bzhin sbyang phyir thabs kyis chos ston to// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'a
195b4(mdo sde): lta ste dper na/ dbul po zhig khyim gyi nang gi mdzod kyi 'og gis la gter chen po dbyig dang gser gyis rab tu gang ba// mdzod kyi tshad tsam zhig mi bdun srid kyi sas
195b5(mdo sde): yog pa'i 'og na yod la// gter chen po de mi dbul po de la 'di skadadu/ kye mi nga ni gter chen po ste/ sas yo ga cing 'dugo zhes ni mi smra ste/ 'di lta ste/ gter
195b6(mdo sde): chen po ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can ma yin pa'o// mi dbul po khyim gyi bdag po de ni dbul po sems kyis rjesu sems shing de nyid kyi steng na rnam par rgyu yang
195b7(mdo sde): sa'i 'og na gter chen po yod pa de ma thos mi shes ma mthong // rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa'i yid la byed pa khyim lta bur gyur
195b8(mdo sde): pa'i 'og na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi gter chen po yod kyang / san
196a1(mdo sde): dag gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa la chags pas sdug bsngal bas 'khor ba na 'khor te/ chos kyi gter chen po dem thos pas thob par ma chu
196a2(mdo sde): cang yongasu sbyang ba'i phyir brtson pa yang mi byed// rigs kyi bu dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i nang du 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter ched po
196a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu ston to// de dag kyang chos kyi gter chen po de la mos nas rko ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang
196a4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams shes bya ste/ chos kyi gter chen po lta bur gyur nas/ sems can rnams la sngon ma byung ba 'am/ sngon ma byung ba'i gtan tshigs kyi rnam pa dang / dpeng
196a5(mdo sde): byed pa'i gtan tshigs dang / bya ba rnams ston pa gang ra chen po'i mdzod kyi sbyin bdag chags pa med pa'i spob pa dang ldan zhing / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / 
196a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos mang po'i mdzod du gyur pa yino// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin gtso
196a7(mdo sde): pa'i mig shin tu ma su sa pa/ sems can thams cad de lta bur mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre
196a8(mdo sde): pa'i mdzod yongasu sbyang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar dbul
196b1(mdo sde): ngo'i khyim gyi 'og logs na// dbyig dang gser gyis gang ba'i gter yod pa// de la g.yo ba 'am rlom sems yod min te// nga ni khyod kyi yin zhes de mi smra// de yi tshen sems can
196b2(mdo sde): khyim bdag de// dbul bar gyur la rnam par mi shes shing // sus kyang de la bskyed pa med pas na// dbul po de ni de yi steng na 'dug/ de ltar ngas ni sangs rgyas mig gis// sen
196b3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad dbul 'dra la// de dag rnams la gter chen yod pa dang // g.yo ba med cing bde gshegs lus mthong // ngas ni de mthong ba nga chub sems dpa' la// khyod kyi
196b4(mdo sde): nga yi ye shes mdzod zung la// dbul ba med cing 'jig rten mgor gyur dang // bla med chos gter 'gyur bar gyis shes bstan// gang dag ngas bstan pa la mos gyur pa// sems
196b5(mdo sde): de dag kun la gter yod do// gang dag mos nas bdag nyid rtsol byed pa// de dag myur du byang chub mchog 'thob 'gyur// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ 
196b6(mdo sde): dper na/ shing a mra'i 'bras bu 'am/ 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu 'am/ ta la'i 'bras bu 'am/ spa'i 'bras bu yang rung ste/ pi shun gyi sbubs kyi nang na// myu gu'i sa don rung mi tha
196b7(mdo sde): ba'i chos can yod pa gang gis sa la btab na/ shing gi rgyal po chen por 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'jig rten gnas pa 'dod chags dang
196b8(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i phyi shun gyi sbubs kyis kun tu dkris par mthong // de la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa
197a1(mdo sde): dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi nang na snying por gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de ni sems can zhes bya ba'i ming du chag so// de la ga
197a2(mdo sde): bsal bar gyur pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs yongasu sbyangs pa'i phyir/ sems can gyi khams kyi ye shes chen po'i tshogs gyur pa
197a3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni rnyed pa'o// sems can gyi khams kyi ye shes chen po'i tshogs pa nga ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du smra bar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
197a4(mdo sde): mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'i 'du shes byed// rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
197a5(mdo sde): rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir don de nye bar ston to// de nas ngo tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag pa
197a6(mdo sde): stsal to// ji ltar swa yi 'bras bu thang ni// nang na sra yi myu gu yod pa ste// ta la dang ni 'dzam bu kun la'ang yod// nang na yod pa'i 'bras bu bskyed na skye// de bzhin chos kyi dab
197a7(mdo sde): phyag 'dren pa yang // sems can thams cad snga yi sa bon 'dra// de kun nang na bde gshegs lus yod par// zag mad sangs rgyas mig gi dam pas mthong // sbubs bshig
197a8(mdo sde): ma gyur de ni sems can brjod// mi shes nang na gnas kyang rlom sems med// ting 'dzin thob ste gnas nas rab zhi ste// de la g.yo ba ci yang yod ma yin// dper na sdong tshanas
197b1(mdo sde): don las byung ltar// sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'tshang rgya zhing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skyabs 'gyur zhes// yongs sbyang ba'i don tu chos gtam smra// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan ya
197b2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu dbul po zhig la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che sna bdun las byas pa// lag mabil tsam zhig yod la/ de nas skyes bu dbul po ngas/ 
197b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te// 'brog dgon pa las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod par gyur nas// ci nas kyang de gzhan gyis mi tshor zhing / rkun pos mi khyer bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
197b4(mdo sde): des de ras rul pa dri mi zhis pa'i dum bu du mas dkris te/ de nas skyes bu de 'brog dgon pa de nyid nyes pa gang gis kyang 'chi ba'i dus byas par ma gyur la/ de'i de bzhin gshegs
197b5(mdo sde): pa'i sku gzugs rin po che las byas pa/ ras yu pa'i dum bus dkris pa yang rdog lam de na 'phyan cing 'dug pa dang / 'dron po rnams kyis ma shes nas/ 'goms
197b6(mdo sde): shing 'goms shing dong la// ras rul pa dri mi zhim pa'i dum bu'i bum bu kun tu 'dril ba 'di gang nas rlung gis bdas shes smad pa'i dngos por yang ston pa dang / 'brog na gnas
197b7(mdo sde): nga'i lhas lha'i mig gis rnam par bltas na/ mi gzhan dag cig la bstan te/ kye skyes bu dag ras kyi dum bu'i thum bu 'di'i nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
197b8(mdo sde): rin po ma las byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yod kyis phye shig ces bsgo'o// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thang
198a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i dkri bas bkris te/ smad pa'i 'os gyur cing / yun ring por 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na kun tu 'khyam par mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu dag pa mdung
198a2(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba rnams kyang rung ste/ sems can nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi dkri bas dkris par gyur pa rnams kyi nang na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus nga ci 'dra ba yod pa
198a3(mdo sde): mthong / rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing / yongasu dag par gyur la/ ji ltar da ltar
198a4(mdo sde): bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur snyam nas/ nyon mongs pa'i dkri bas dkris pa las thar par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la chos ston
198a5(mdo sde): to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu baHda pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar dri nga smad par 'os rnams kyis// yongasu dkris pa bang bar gshegs kyi gzun/ 
198a6(mdo sde): rin chen byas pa ras dum dkris pa de// lam gyi bar na bor te 'khyam gyur pa// lha yi mig gis de ni mthong na su// lha nges gzhan zhig la ni rab smras pa// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ri
198a7(mdo sde): chen yod// ras dum bum bu 'di ni myur du phye// de bzhin nga yi lha mig 'di 'dra ba// des ni sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang // nyon mongs dkri bas dkris nas rab sdug bsngal// 
198a8(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ni rtag gces mthong // ngas ni nyon mongs dkris pa'i nang dag na// rgyal ba'i sku ni mnyam par bzhag gyur la// de ni g.yo ba med cing mi 'gyur yang // nga yongs
198b1(mdo sde): thar byed gang yang med pa mthong // ngas mthong de nas skul ma btab pa ni// byang chub mchog tu gang dag zhugs pa nyon// de ltar sems can chos nyid 'di 'drar rtag/ 'di na yongasu dkris pa'i
198b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba bzhugs// bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yongs bkrol nas// gang tshe nyon mongs thams cad rab zhi pa// de tshe 'di ni sangs rgyas med thob ste// lha dang mi rnams sems ni rab tu
198b3(mdo sde): dga'// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ bud med mgon med par gyur pa/ mdog ngan pa/ dri mi zhim pa/ smad par 'os pa/ 'jig su rung ba/ blta na mi sdug pa/ 'dre mo 'dra
198b4(mdo sde): ba zhig mgon med pa'i khang par zhugs nas gnas// de der gnas pa dang sbrum mar gyur te/ gang gis gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ba
198b5(mdo sde): sems can de 'dra ba zhig de'i mngal du zhugs kyang / bud med de mngal na 'dug pa'i sems can de la bdag gi mngal du zhugs pa'i sems can 'di ci 'dra ba zhig snyam du hA
198b6(mdo sde): yid la mi byed/ bdag gi mngal du zhugs sam/ ma zhugs skam pa yang de de na yid la mi byed kyi/ gzhan du na de dbul ba'i sems dang / zhum pa dang / dman pa dang / khong du chung ba snyam par
198b7(mdo sde): sems rjesu sems shing / mdog ngan pa dang / dri mi zhim pa nyid kyis mgon med pa'i khang pa na gnas te/ dus 'da' bar byeda'o// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du sems can thaMd kyang mgon ma
198b8(mdo sde): par gyur cing / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses par gyur la/ srid par skye ba'i gnas mgon med pa'i khang pa na gnaso// de nas sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
199a1(mdo sde): zhugs te/ khong na yod kyang sems can de dag gis khong du ma nung // rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can dag bdag nyid la khang du mi gsang
199a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed bdag nyid srog shi bar ma byed par khyed brtson 'grus brtan par gyis shig dang / khyed la de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs pa yod pa dus shig na 'a
199a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ khyed byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa'i grangasu 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can zhes bya bar ni ma yino// der yang sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'i// byang chub sem
199a4(mdo sde): dpa' zhes bya bar ni ma yino zhes chos ston to//  nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji lta bud med mgon ring gyur pa zhig kha
199a5(mdo sde): ngan cing gzugs ni mi sdug la// byis pa yin te/ mgon med khang par gnas// re shig dus na de ni der sbrum gyur// de yi mngal du gang zhig nges par ni// 'khor los sgyu
199a6(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po che ba nyid// rin chen rnams kyis 'phags pa'i gling bzhi yi// bdag po byed par 'gyur ba de 'dra zhugs// bud med byis pa de ni 'di lta bur// mngal du zhugs sam
199a7(mdo sde): ma zhugs mi shes la// mgon med khang pa na ni gnas byed// dbul ba snyam du sems shing dus 'da' byed// de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang // mgon med gyur la
199a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal chos kyis nyen// khams gsum pa yi bde ba chung la gnas// nang na chos nyid mngal 'dra yod par mthong // de 'dra mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' la// 'jig
199b1(mdo sde): rten phan par byed pa mngal gnas na// sems can kun gyis chos nyid ma shes kyis// bdag dman 'du shes ma bskyed cig ces bstan// khyed cag brtson 'grus brtsam pa brtan gyis
199b2(mdo sde): dang / rang lus ring por mi thogs rgyal bar 'gyur// dus zhig byang chub snying po thob gyur nas// sreg chags stong phrag bya ba grol byed 'gyur// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di
199b3(mdo sde): lta ste dper na/ spra tshil las D+ha'i gzugs sam/ glang po che'i gzugs sam/ bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs dag cig byas te/ 'jim pa'i nang ra bcug nas ga
199b4(mdo sde): la bzhu ste/ zags par byas la gser ba'u ste/ zhu bar gyur pas bkang na/ rim gyis grangs par gyur nas/ mnyam par gnas par gyur pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad phyi rol
199b5(mdo sde): gyi 'jim pa gnag cing kha dog mi sdug kyang / nang gi rnams ni gser las byas pa dag go// de na mgar ba 'am/ mgar ba'i slob ma zhig gis/ de las gzugs pa
199b6(mdo sde): dang gang dag grangs par gyur par mthong ba de dang de dag gi phyir rim gyi 'jim pa tho bas bkogs na/ deskad cig de la nang na gser las byas pa'i gzugs yod pa dag
199b7(mdo sde): yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis sems can thams cad 'jim pa'i gzugs lta bu yin la
199b8(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi nang gi sbu gu sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis gang ste/ zag pa med pa'i ye shes rin po che'i nang na/ de bzhin ga
200a1(mdo sde): / mdzes par 'dug pa mthong // rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad de ltar mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i nang du seng ste 'di lta bu'i ches rnam
200a2(mdo sde): grangs 'di dag yang dag par rab tu ston to// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag zhi zhing bsal bar gyur pa de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che yongs
200a3(mdo sde): spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rdo rje'i the bas phyi rol gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog so// rigs kyi bu dag mgar ba zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dag / 
200a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sems can thams cad de ltar mthong nas/ nyon mongs de
200a5(mdo sde): ngag las thar par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir ston to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 
200a6(mdo sde): ltar gzugs ni phyi rol 'jim pas g.yogs// nang ni sbu gu yod cing gsog yin pa// rin chen bzhugs pas rab tu bkang na ni// brgya stong phrag ni mang por gyur ba yin// mag
200a7(mdo sde): bas shin tu grangs par gyur shes nas// 'di ltar rin chen las ni byas pa 'di// rnam dag gzugs 'gyur las gang bya snyam ste// gzugs la g.yogs pa'i 'jim pa 'go/ 
200a8(mdo sde): par byed// de bzhin ngas ni sems can zad kyang // gser gzugs 'jim pas g.yogs pa 'dra ba ste// bai rol shun pa nyon mongs sbubs yin la// nang na sangs rgyas ye shes ro/ 
200b1(mdo sde): par mthong // de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ni// zhi zhing shin tu bsil bar gyur pa dag/ gang gis de dag nyon mongs ma lus 'byin// chos kyi lag nas de la 'gogs par byed// na
200b2(mdo sde): chen gzugs ni blta na sdug pa ltar// rgyal sras gang zhig 'dir ni dag gyur pa// stobs bcu dag gis lus rnams yongs gang ste// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di na mchod par 'gyur
200b3(mdo sde): ngas ni sreg chags thams cad de ltar mthong // byang chub sems dpa' 'ang ngas ni de ltar mthong // de ltar dag pa bde bar gshegs 'gyur te// bde gshegs dag ni sangs rgyas rdul
200b4(mdo sde): ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chu ba sems dpa' rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal ga rdo rje'i blo gro sa rigs kyi bu mo khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/ 
200b5(mdo sde): gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / glegs bam du byas te 'jog pa dang / gzha
200b6(mdo sde): dag la yang rgya cher 'chad pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i blo gros yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin ga
200b7(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes bsgrubs pa'i phyir brngon par gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas thaMd la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs nas 'di lta bu'i ting 'dzin
200b8(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs te/ ting 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung
201a1(mdo sde): / chub sems dpa' rnams dang bcas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs shing gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa/ dus ba ba
201a2(mdo sde): rgyar dpag tshad ram la/ 'phang du dpag tshad bsru pa/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa/ lha'i dri nim pa dang ldan pa/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/ leng spyod kha na ma tho ba med po zang da
201a3(mdo sde): pa 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed nyin re zhing phul te/ bskal pa 'bum du tshang ba'i bar du 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byed pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan
201a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dpe cig tsam lus la 'am ngam/ glegs bam du gnas par byed na/ rdo rje'i bla
201a5(mdo sde): de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la/ bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga mas brgya'i cha dang / stong gi cha dang / 'bum gi cha dang / grangs dang / ma dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang
201a6(mdo sde): nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rgyur yang mi bzed do// rdo rje'i blo gros yang byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu tshol bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las de bzhim gsheg pa
201a7(mdo sde): re re la yang bskal pa 'bum tshang gi bar du/ shing man da ra ba'i me tog khal bzhi pa 'bum 'thor la// rdo rje'i blo gros dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsen ma zhig gis byang chub tu
201a8(mdo sde): bskyed/ de bzhim gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ thal mo lan cig sbyar te/ rje su yi rang zhes tshig gcig smras ma rdo rje'i blo gros bsod nams mngon par 'du bya
201b1(mdo sde): dang / dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba de la me tog phreng phul ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bzhag pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma nges/ bcu'i
201b2(mdo sde): dang steng gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rgyur yang mi bzod// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs bcad pa 'di dag
201b3(mdo sde): dka' stsal te// sems can la la gang zhig byang chub la// mos pa bskyed nas 'di nyan 'dzin pa 'am// yi ger 'dri 'am glag bam gzhag byed cing // gus dang bcas pas tshigs bcad
201b4(mdo sde): gcig bshad dam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di thos nas// gang zhig byang chub mchog 'di tshol byed na// bsod nams phung po dza tsam skyed 'gyur ba// de yi phan yon 'dir ni mnyan par
201b5(mdo sde): gyis/ rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog 'di la gnas nasu// dpa' bo bskal pa dag ni steng bar du// phyogs bcu rnams mi yi gtso bo dag/ nyan thos bcas pa rnams la bsti stang byed
201b6(mdo sde): ji ltar gang+gA steng mang bye ba bas// de bas lhag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// gzhal med khang mchog rin chen las byas pa/ 'jig rten slob dpon re re la yang phul// de dag 'bad
201b7(mdo sde): dpag tshad bcu yod la// mchu dang rgyar ni dpag tshad gcig yod pa// spos dang bdug pa dag dang rab ldan la// de na rin chen las byas khri bshams shing // dar dang bcas bu ras ni brgya bting ba'i// 
201b8(mdo sde): khri dag dang ni khri stan gzhar rnams kyang // ji ltar gang+gA'i klung bzhin dpag med pa// rgyal ba gcig la dbul ba byas gyur la// rgyal ba gang dag 'jig rten khams zhugs pa/ ji ltar gang+gA byes
202a1(mdo sde): / bas mang ba// rgyal ba de dag rnams la de ltar phul// kun la gus par mchod pa byed pa bas// mkhas pa gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos ras// dpe gcig tsam zhig yang dag 'dzin byed dang
202a2(mdo sde): bzung nas mi 'ga' zhig la 'chad byed na// de ri de bas bsod nams phung po mang // dpa' bos bzung ba'i bsod nams 'di la ni// ra dang dpar yang de ni nyer mi 'gro/ srog chags dag ni kun gyi skabs
202a3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing // de ni myur du byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya// de bzhin gshegs kyi snying po 'dra yod pa// sems can dag ni kun gyi chos nyid 'di// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang sems pa// de ni rang
202a4(mdo sde): byung sangs rgyas myur du 'gyur// rdo rje'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar ros kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar byang du sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la tha~Md mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstsu
202a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i gces spras byed par rig par bya'o/ rdo rje'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa shin tu rgyas pa/ rang med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 
202a6(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med pa/ brjod med pa/ de'i pha rol bas kyang ches pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs
202a7(mdo sde): ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu 'od zer gtong bzhis
202a8(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten du byung // rdo rje'i blo gros ci'i phyir nga bzhin gshegs pa de rtag kyi 'od zer gtong zhes bya zhe na/ rdo rje'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 'od zer gtong sa
202b1(mdo sde): rlung sems dpar gyur pa na// ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu de ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du lus las 'od byung ste/ shar phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
202b2(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas rtag/  khyab par gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / shar lho dang / lce nub dang / rub byang dang / reg dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu
202b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi 'od dga' bar 'gyur ba/ 
202b4(mdo sde): sdug pa/ mchog tu dga' ba byed pa/ mgu bar 'a gyur pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag de snyed snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur te// rdo rje'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' ma
202b5(mdo sde): mngal na gnas pa de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag tu sems can gang dag la reg par gyur pa de dag zad gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / kha dag dang ldan pad
202b6(mdo sde): dran pa dang ldan pa dang / blo gros dang ldan pa dang / rtog pa dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa dang ldan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag na sems can gang dag sen dmal ba dang / dang
202b7(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rang gi 'gro
202b8(mdo sde): ngag nas shi 'phos te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na skye so// de dag reg pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// yang phyir mi ldog pa
203a1(mdo sde): gyur to// yang phyir mi ldog pa gang dag 'od des reg pa de dag reg ma thag/ tu de dag thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// yon tan lnga brgya pa'i la
203a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thobo// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi 'od kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gang dag la reg par gyur pa de dag thaMd bai DUr+ya las
203a3(mdo sde): grub par yongasu gnas par gyur te/ gser gyi skud pas mig mangs risu bres par gyur la/ mig mangs ris thams cad nas kyang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 
203a4(mdo sde): dri dang / kha dog dang ldan pa rnams 'thon par gyur to// ring po che'i shing de dag gis bskyod cing rlung gis bskul na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / ngag 'du
203a5(mdo sde): gyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang / dbang po dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par
203a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i sgra snyan pa yi du 'ong ba 'di lta bu 'di dag byung // rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i sgra ngas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum po de dag thams cad na/ sems can rnams dga' ba
203a7(mdo sde): dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas gnaso// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi
203a8(mdo sde): ris rnams med par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de yang sen de dag thams cad la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du snang bar gyur te/ mngal na gnas pa
203b1(mdo sde): nyid la nyin lan gsum mtshan lam gsum du thal me sbyar ba'i las byaso// rdo rje'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa'adi bcas pa dang / mngon par byung ba dang / byang chub mngon pa
203b2(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus las 'od de rtag tu byung bar gyur to// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i lus las
203b3(mdo sde): 'ong rtag tu byung bar gyur to// tshul de bzhin du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das de'i lus kyi 'od de rtag tu byung bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongasu
203b4(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das te/ ring bsrel mchod rten la gnas pa'i tshe yang lus kyi 'od de rtag tu byung bar gyur te/ rdo rje'i blo gros de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhes bya ba
203b5(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi mtshan gsol to// rdo rje'i blo gros yang ba ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang nga/ par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'ong zer gtong
203b6(mdo sde): dang po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bstan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od gzer mtha' yas shes bya ba g.yog stong dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ rdo rje'i blo gros byang chub
203b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od gzer gtong de la// de bzhin gshegs
203b8(mdo sde): pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las brtsams te yongasu driso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu'ong/ 
204a1(mdo sde): // zer gtong des/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag rje su gzung ba dang / yongasu gzung ba'i phyir stan cig la 'dug bzhin du/ bskal pa chen po lnga brgyar de bzhin gshegs pa
204a2(mdo sde): snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tshig rnam par shes par bya bas/ ros bsgrub pa dang / nges pa'i
204a3(mdo sde): tshig dang / dpe 'bum phrag du mas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la yang dag par rab tu bshad pas phyogs bcu rnamasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig
204a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yang chags chung ngus go bar gyur to// rdo rje'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs
204a5(mdo sde): 'di tha na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad mthar gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin nas/ yon tan bkod pa de 'dra ba nyid du/ bla na med pa
204a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi ni ma gtog so// rdo rje'i blo gros de'i na de'i dus na khyang
204a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi lta ste/ rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems
204a8(mdo sde): dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la gang dag da dung yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
204b1(mdo sde): ma rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / mthu chen thob dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje'i blo gros
204b2(mdo sde): khyod nyid bzhi'o// rdo rje'i blo gres de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ sangs rgyas
204b3(mdo sde): kyi ye shes sgrub pas don che ba yino// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'das pa'i dus ni bskal pa mtha' yas na// bcom ldan
204b4(mdo sde): 'od zer gtong zhes bya ba byung // de'i lus las 'di 'dra'i 'od byung bas// zhing rnams bye ba stong dag snang bar gyur// rgyal ba dang po mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas rig/ byang chub sems
204b5(mdo sde): dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas kyis// de tshe bde gshegs rgyal dbang de la zhus// mdo 'di rtag tu yang dag rab tu bshad/ gang gis rgyal de'i bstan las mdo sde 'di// 'drer pa lnga
204b6(mdo sde): ni mngon sum thos gyur pa// de kun myur du byang chub dam pa thob// byang chub sems dpa' bzhi ni ma gtogs te// mthu chen thob dam spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug / byang chub sems
204b7(mdo sde): dpa' 'jam dpal gsum pa ste// rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid bzhi pa yin// de tshe de dag gis ni mdo 'di thos// byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas pa/ tshe gang gis rgyal la zhus byung ste
204b8(mdo sde): de'i dbang byas bde gshegs sras po ni// de tshe rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid yin// nga yang sngon ni spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// bde bar gshegs pa sang+ge'i rgyal mtshan las// mdo sde 'di yi ming ni thos par
205a1(mdo sde): gyur/ gus par byas te thos nas thal me sbyar// nga ni legs par byas pa'i las de yis// byang chub dam pa myur du thob par gyur// de bas byang chub sems dpa' ma
205a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis// rtag tu medo mchog 'di ni gzung bar bya// rdo rje'i blo gres rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i ras
205a3(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan dam/ lung nod dam kha ten byed dam/ sten kyang rung ches kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / rab tu 'chad pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba de
205a4(mdo sde): dag la tshogs chung ngus ches de dag kyang mngon sum du 'gyur/ las kyi sgrib pa de yang byang bar 'gyu ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol te
205a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu memo gang las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs par mi 'gyur zhing / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson par bgyid pa de dag sangs
205a6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig las mang du thos pas bstan pa'i slad du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu
205a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas brgya'i chos bstan pa kun tu gzung ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba dag kyang yod// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas
205a8(mdo sde): gis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / stong dang / nyis stong dang / sum stong dang / ba ni stong dang / lnga stong dang / drug stong dang / bdun stong dang / brgyad stong dang / dgu stong da
205b1(mdo sde): khri dang / sangs rgyas 'bum nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi bar dag gi chos bstan pa kun tu gzung ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba dag kyang yod// kun dga' bo byang chub sem dpa
205b2(mdo sde): gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / gleg bam du byas te/ 'chang ba nges 'di snyam du bdag gis deng
205b3(mdo sde): nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thobo snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ de ni ji ltar da ltar bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya/ 
205b4(mdo sde): ba'i 'os dang / mched pa'i 'os yino// de nas de'i tshe bcom lnga/ 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde 'di thos nas// bdag
205b5(mdo sde): gis byang chub dam pa thob par bsam// gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa// de ni nga ltar 'jig rten phyag bya'i 'os// de ni 'jig rten mgon po rnam par 'dren// khri byed rnam par khrid
205b6(mdo sde): byed bsngags pa'i 'os// gang gi lagan mang sde 'di yod pa// de ni nga ltar chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa// me yi khyu mchog chos kyi sgrom ma 'dzin// de ni'i zla/ 
205b7(mdo sde): bur blta ba'i 'os// 'jig rten mgon po lta bur phyag bya'i gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i blo gros dang / thams cad dang ldan
205b8(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chog de dang / nyan thos rin po de dag dang / 'khor bzhi pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
206a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs su/ 
206a2(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ A ru tsa tu ra dA ra ka sa ma d+hir ma
206a3(mdo sde): ma pA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khye'u bzhi'i ting 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang ngo // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
206a4(mdo sde): 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba de nyid kyi dus kyi tshe/ ku sha'i grong khyer na/ gyang rnams dang nye ba na yod pa
206a5(mdo sde): shing sa la zung gi bar na bzhug so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/ 
206a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par rtog cing 'di 'dug// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta mi'i bu khod ci'i phyir/ nga bani/ 
206a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mig mi 'dzums par rtog par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdang bdag gis de ban
206a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongasu mya ngani las 'da' ba'i snga ltas/ g.yar lam 'jigs pa chen po'i 'jig su rung ba/ spu zing zhes bgyid pa zhig rmis lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
206b1(mdo sde): g.yar lam de rmis nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu myur bar yongs mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur lags grang snyam nas/ de'i slad sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang mya ngan gyi zag
206b2(mdo sde): rngus gzir bar gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta ma'i bu khyod kyi rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i snga ltas 'jigs pa ji
206b3(mdo sde): lta bu zhig rmi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa/ sa la'i tshal khrod 'di nyid du// 'jig rten mgon po'i ltas ni// khyod kyi
206b4(mdo sde): rmi lam ci rmis pa// dris pa de ni nga la smos// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigasu bcad gsol pa// mdang gsum bdag gi g.yar lam na// 'jig su rung
206b5(mdo sde): zhing sngangs gying la// spu zing bgyid pa rmis gyur pa// / de ni mi mchog gsan du gsol// 'jig rten khams 'dir ljon pa'i shing // rtag tu me tog 'bras bu rtag/ rnam pa kun
206b6(mdo sde): gyi mchog ldan la// yid ni dga' bar bgyid pa 'khrungs// 'jig rten khams ljon mchog de// grib ma bsil bas sems can rnams// rab tu dga' bgyid bro nang dang // mya ngan dag
206b7(mdo sde): kyang sel bar bgyid// yon dam mtha' yas phun tshigs shing // sring rtse'i bar du mtho bar 'phags// de mthong bas ni mig dag cing // thos pas rna ba rnam dag 'gyur// de las rab
206b8(mdo sde): 'jam ngon ldan zhing // shin tu rigs shing chos ldan la// sems can kun la bde skyid pa'i// sgra skad dag kyang nges par 'byung // de las pang+ga'i bye snyed kyi// 'od zer dag ni 'byung 'gyur
207a1(mdo sde): 'di// de dag snyed kyi zhing rnams kyang // ljon shing chen pos bsal bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi mi// mtha' yas dpag tu ma mchis pa// gang dga'
207a2(mdo sde): kyis reg gyur pa// sems can rnams kyi don kyang bgyid// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams ni// de las dri dang 'byung bar 'gyur// gang dag de yi dri snum pa// de dag ngan 'greng pa mi mi 'gyur
207a3(mdo sde): de dag dmyal bar mi mchi zhing // dud 'gro'i skye gnas sdig can dang // yi dgas lnga min res mi mchi// de dag bzang 'grer mchi bar 'gyur// sen kun la bde skyed pa// de 'dra'i ljon
207a4(mdo sde): shing chen po de// gyad gyi dog sar chags nas ni// sa ba'i tshal gyi gseb du sbrel// ldan mchog chag pa mthong gu nas// de nas sreg chags steng phrag no// bsam yas dpag
207a5(mdo sde): ma mchis pa// chongs 'debs shing smre sngags 'don// de tshe sgra de mi grag cing // dri yang gda' bar ma gyur la// gdeg pa'i rdo yang ma theg nas// de ma thag tu bdag kyang brgyal// de lngar
207a6(mdo sde): 'jig su rung ba dang // sku yang zing zhes bgyid pa yi// g.yar lam mdang sum rmis pa de// spyan dang ldan pas bdag la gsungs// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 
207a7(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po rengs pa dang / bdud kyi bu ded dpon dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag so so gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs mya ngan las 'das dri
207a8(mdo sde): snga lngas mthong nas/ rang rang gi 'khor lha'i bu khrag khrig phrag brgyad du brgyad du lhag tsam gyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bangar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste ldam
207b1(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sgra skad 'thun par 'am thag pa'i nga ros ngu zhing mya ngan byed la smre sngags 'don bzhin du// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
207b2(mdo sde): la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// kye ma'o sdug bsngal mi bzang che// sul ba'i tshal khrid dga' bar ni// de ring mgon po mya ngan 'da'// kun dga' khyod kyis mi shes sam// gang zhig sna
207b3(mdo sde): med rnams kyi sgron// skyabs dang dpung gnyen gang yin pa// de ni zhi ba len med par// de ring mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang
207b4(mdo sde): thad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor de dag la tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa// ji ltar mthong ba gzhan min te// de ring su la'i tshal khrod du// nga ni ma ngan 'da' 'gyur gyis// ma ngan ma byed brtan
207b5(mdo sde): par gyis// kha dog ldan zhing bsam byas la// 'od dang dri bsung pun tshogs pa'i// ljon shing ljon pa chen po de/ sru la'i tshal khrod chag gyur pa// ljon shing ci 'drar ston pa ni
207b6(mdo sde): de ring sA la'i tshal khrod// ji ltar me la rkus btab bzhin// len meng mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// shes rab rdzu 'phral mthar phyin pa// nye rgyal pang nas sras dag bzhin// mi mchog nga yang
207b7(mdo sde): 'da' 'gyur bar// kun dga' khyod kyis mi gas sam// 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag ste// skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ na pas de dag rab mkhyen nas// dge slong rnams la
207b8(mdo sde): yang bshad// kun dga' tshur shog khyod song la// nga'i nyan thos rnams la smos// lha yi mig gi mthar phyin pa// gnas brtan chen po ma 'gags dang // gnas brtan rin po ka t+ya'i bu// 
208a1(mdo sde): gnas brtan gang po rab 'byor dang // gsum pa chen chen pa dang / kha lang bdag dang dga' byed dang // gro zhin don mong rgyal po dang // chos pas ngan pa'amang ba dang / 
208a2(mdo sde): dga' bo dang ni sgra can bzang // nga yi nyan thos gzhan rnams dang // slob dang mi slob gnas brtan dang // gzhan yang so so'i skye bo dag/ nga ni mya ngan 'da' 'gyur gyis// thams cad shin
208a3(mdo sde): tu myur bar sgron// slob dang so so'i skye bo yis// ma mthong sdug bsngal skye 'gyur bas// mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu ni// mya ngan drug rngus gzir ma bya// mya ngan ma byed 'du byed rnams// 
208a4(mdo sde): mi rtag rmi lam lta bu zhes// ji ltar chos kyi chos nyid kyis// de dag rnams ni dbugs dbyung ba// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
208a5(mdo sde): kun dga' bos slar tshigasu bcad gsol pa// mgon po sangs rgyas mya ngan las// 'da' bar 'gyur ba thos nas bdag/ phyogs bslang bdag ni lus rma zhing // ngadag ni g.yang
208a6(mdo sde): ngan shin tu che// lus nyams bde ba ma mchis shing // sems nyams bde ba 'ang ma mchis la// chags bral nyams bde'ang ma mchis na// spyan ldan pa dag ni ji ltar ma chi// / 
208a7(mdo sde): gi skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang // 'jig rten rnam 'dren gang lags pa// deng mthong slad kyi mi mthong zhes// gnas brtan rnams la ji skad bgyi// mya ngan gyur cing sdug bsngal ba/ 
208a8(mdo sde): ji ltar mya ngan brjod par bgyi// bdag cag rnams kyi 'jigs chen 'di// gnas brtan de dag ji ltar nyan// gang dag slob dang skye bo yi// dge slong mya ngan drug rngu yis// kun nas
208b1(mdo sde): drug pa ji ltar gnas// mi mchog bskal par bzhugasu gsol// 'khor bzhi'i nang du mchis nas ni// ston pa mya ngan 'dar 'gyur zhes// ji ltar brjod kyi mi'i mchog/ khrub che bas
208b2(mdo sde): bar bzhugs gsol// sgron ma chen po 'jig rten du// shin tu myur bar nub 'gyur te// 'jig rten 'di dag rab myur ba// ldongs pa nyid du 'gyur lags// mi mchog bdag ni gsar na
208b3(mdo sde): 'di/ dge slong rnams la smrar mi spro// gang la g.yar ngan ma maris pa// gzhan zhig mngag par bka' stsal stsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta ra'i bu 'ang byed 'ang
208b4(mdo sde): mi rtag pa yin gyis mya ngan ma byed par song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la phyir tshigasu bsade bka' stsal pa/ bye ba mtha' yas lha rnams
208b5(mdo sde): kyis// de ring sangs rgyas 'da' thos nas// gzhal med khang dag spongs nas ni// mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'dod/ nga 'angs phyi na dge slong dag/ ma mthong mya ngan byed ma gzhag
208b6(mdo sde): 'di ni rim gro byed pa'i las// song la dge slong rnams kyang sbyin// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa ri rab kyi spe la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston cing 'dug/ 
208b7(mdo sde): ro dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas/ lha'i bu dbang ra ba dbang che bar grags pa rnams rang rang gi gzhal med 'ang dag nas ma
208b8(mdo sde): snang bar gyur pa mthong zhing / lha rnams kyi smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra chen po dag kyang thos// rang gi 'khor rnams kyang slabs par mthong // de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags
209a1(mdo sde): / pas de'i tshe bsams te/ lha'i mig gis lha'i bu 'khor dang bcas pa de dag yi chad ring rang rang gi 'dod pa'i dga' bdag spangs te rings pa rings par gang du da
209a2(mdo sde): 'dong bar byed ces 'jig rten la rnam par blta'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ ri'i rgyal por rab kyi rtse mo las dpag cad brgya sam ngag rang pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi la
209a3(mdo sde): las dpag tshad nyis brgya tsam dang / rtse mo las dpag tshad sum brgya tsam dang / rtse mo las dpag tshad bzhi brgya tsam dag rad pa dang / rnga mo las dpag tshad lnga brgya ma dag rang ring rgya
209a4(mdo sde): mtsho chen po'i nang du lhung ba dag kyang mthong ste/ sems can 'ga' tsam la yang gnod pa 'am/ rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed na/ srog gi bar chad byed par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos 'di
209a5(mdo sde): ltar ri rab kyi rtse mo de dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab la rten cing gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
209a6(mdo sde): de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba thos nas/ mya ngan gyi zug rngus gzir cing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ shAk+Sha'i bdag po'i rgyal po bskal pa bye ba grangs
209a7(mdo sde): med pa nas yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu yong su dag pa dang ldan pa de// de ring kyang rnams dang nye ba na yod pa shing sa la zung gi drung du len pa med par yongasu mya ngan las
209a8(mdo sde): 'da' bar 'gyur te/ deng ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mi gzums par 'gyuraro// de dag ku shi'i grong khyer log su mngon par phyogs te/ rings pa rings par brtad cing dong ba dag gis/ 
209b1(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo de dag kun tu rab tu bskul cing kun tu rab tu bskyod te/ rings pa rings par brtad pa de dag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po yang g.yos shing 'khrug par
209b2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de'i phyir ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse me de dag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du lhung bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags ri rab kyi spo la 'dug pas/ de'i tshe sgra skad chen po byung
209b3(mdo sde): ste/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// 'jig rten khams kyi ded dpon gang yin pa// gang gis 'jig rten bde la snrel mdzad cing // sems can rnams kyi sbyin gnas gang yin pa// thub pa de
209b4(mdo sde): ni de ring mya ngan 'angar// ye shes 'byung gnas rab rib mun bcom zhing // 'jig rten srog chags rnams dang pa dang ma// da bzhin skyabs dang dpung gnyen gang yin pa/ 
209b5(mdo sde): ba da ni de ring mya ngan 'da'// zug rngu 'byin mdzad sdig med nyen mongs med// gsol mdzad dam pa sman pa chen po ste// mi dge zug rngu 'byin mchog gang yin pa// thub pa de ni de ring mya
209b6(mdo sde): ngan 'da'// gang zhig sems can chags dang sdang bas bcom// rmongs pas zil non rga dang 'chi la chags// 'gags 'gal lam leg zhugs pa gzigs nas ni// 'jig rten thug
209b7(mdo sde): rje bsgreng nas chos ston cing // gang zhig bdud sde rab gtum drag po'i gzugs// sna tshogs gzugs can mtshon sra rdo rje thogs// kha cig 'jigs pa du ma rnam ston cing // gzha / 
209b8(mdo sde): sna tshogs drag thogs 'khod gyur pa// de 'drar rnam mang drag po'i gzugs can gyi// sde dag gzigs kyang mi g.yo mi 'gul ba// bdud kyi sde bcom 'jig rten mgon pade/ 
210a1(mdo sde): la'i tshal du de ring mya ngan 'da'// gang gis phyag g.yas rab tu brkyang mdzad// ri rab rtse 'di grong bcas g.yo mdzad cing // chos kun mnga' brnyes rnam 'dren drang srod de/ 
210a2(mdo sde): la'i tshal du mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// gang gis sa brdabs phyogs bcur bsam yas pa'i// sgra bsgrags mkhyen pa'i pha rol byon gyur pa// ston pa sems can rnams kyi snying po da/ 
210a3(mdo sde): la'i tshal du de ring mya ngan 'das// gang gis stobs ldan sder bcas skrag mdzad pa// mi g.yo mya ngan med pa 'dus ma byas pa bsres// srog chags rnams la pan phyir 'khor lo bskor mdzad kyi
210a4(mdo sde): thub pas bden pa bzhi dag rab tu bstan// gang zhig cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste// skra rtse 'byon la zhing rnams bkod mdzad cing // sku la sku yi 'du shes mi mnga' ba// mgon
210a5(mdo sde): bong ni de ring mya ngan 'da'// ston pa gyad kyi yul du gshegs nas ni// nyen yod pa'i tshil khrod zhugs gyur te/ bsam gtan bzhi la bdag 'di mnyam bzhag nas// shing zad
210a6(mdo sde): me ltar mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshig su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'dzam+bu'i gling na// dge slong dang / dge slong
210a7(mdo sde): dang dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed pa rnams las/ gnas brtan 'od srung chen po 'khor dang bcas pa ma gtogs pa dang / gzhan yang dge slong nyis brgya rtsa bzhi ma gangs
210a8(mdo sde): pa de las gzhan pa'i 'khor bzhi po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba rnaMs/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i tha mar gyur pa ni 'di yino zhes gyad rnams kyi nye ba na
210b1(mdo sde): yod pa shing su la zung gi tshal ga la ba der dang // tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa rigasu bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kharlan/ 
210b2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa/ mngon par shes pa'i lha dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu dang / klu rgan po dang / klu'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin gzhonu dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / sha za dang / sha za rgan pa
210b3(mdo sde): dang / sha za gzhonu dang / sha za gzhonu ma ji snyed pa rnams dang / 'gre ba na lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / skar ma ji snyed pa de dag
210b4(mdo sde): thams cad mig mchi mas gang ste/ mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don la/ dud mos 'debs shing yang dang yang du sla ste/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la/ mya ngan gyi zug rngus gzir bas/ lag pa
210b5(mdo sde): gnam du bsgreng ste/ dung mos 'debs par byed// yang kha cig ni lag pa sbrel cing ngu'o// kha cig ni phan tshun mgo/ sbed gcig gi gdong du gcig lta zhing du'o// kha cig ni lag
210b6(mdo sde): te nyam theg pa'i nga ro 'byin cing smre sngags 'don la// dbang po nyams shing bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor mog mog por gyur te/ rkang lag sgyur zhing du'o// yang de na kha cig ni gcig la gcig lta
210b7(mdo sde): zhing du'o// kha cig ni glad pa brdebs par byedo// kha cig ni lag pa gnyis mgo la rdebs shing lus rab tu ston slongs par byed// kha cig ni mig sbyar zhing dud mes 'debs la rkang mthil
210b8(mdo sde): bsregs pa bzhin du sbrid pa 'debs shing smre sngags 'don to// kha cig ni e ma'o sangs rgyas/ e ma'o sangs rgyas shes smre sngags 'don cing gdeng marims gang la sdug bsngal
211a1(mdo sde): nyam thag ste/ lag 'thil gyis mig mnyed cing cho nges 'debs la mya ngan byed cing mya ngan gyi zug rngus gzir bas bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la 'drang cing mya ngan byed/ 
211a2(mdo sde): sngags 'dod to// srog chags bya ba phrag mang po gzhan dag ni mchi mas brnangs bzhin du mchi ma glog cing sgra chen po 'byin to// kha cig ni thal mo sbyar te mchi ma glog cing smre sngags
211a3(mdo sde): 'don to// kha cig ni mya ngan gyi mes gdungs nas lag pa g.yas pas mgo la 'dzin cing smre sngags 'don to// de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang lus yongasu rma nas/ lag pa g.yon pas
211a4(mdo sde): mgo la 'dzin cing smre sngags 'don to// kha cig ni lag pa rdebs la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdog nyams shing sngon por gyur la mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing smre sngags 'don to// de nas
