263b5(mdo sde): dang 'dra ste/ phug ron dang bye'u dang ngag dang khyi dang lug la sogs pa'i tshang dang gan su 'gyu ro// dge slong so so na 'dug pa'i gnas ni byi dor bzang du byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis
263b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'di yang khyod la mdo tsam zhig bshad pa yi no// dga' bos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas mchi ma blags te duso// de ltar dga' bo yid gdung zhing ngu ba ni btang
263b7(mdo sde): ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod de ltar ma ngu bar mdo sde 'di gzungs zung la 'jig rten du rgyas par spel cig/ de nas dga' bos gdong mchi ma phyis na
263b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis gzungasu bzung zhes gsol to// brgya byin dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang dga' bo la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa bdag gis kyang yongs bzung ste/ 
264a1(mdo sde): gang dag mdo sde 'di ri 'am/ tshal lam/ shing drung ngam/ bas mtha' 'am dur khrod na gnas te 'don tam klog na/ bdag cag gis lha dang mi'i 'khor dang / mi ma yin pa dang ba
264a2(mdo sde): te/ gnas der 'gro zhing / chung du na tshigs bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig tsam yang mi marjed mi nyams par bzung zhes gsol to// mdo sde 'di gsungs pa'i tshe/ dge slong stong snyed kyis
264a3(mdo sde): dge slong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par gyur to// dge slong ma stong lnga brgyas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// dge bsnyen lnga brgya yongasu dag par gyur te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin/ 
264a4(mdo sde): la sogs pa phyag byas nas phyir dong // 'phags pa ting 'dzin mchog par rdzogs s+ho// / mdo 'di la mkhas pa blo gros zhi ba mos dgongs 'tshal/ rgya gar
264a5(mdo sde): skad du/ Ar+ya mA yo pa ma sa ma d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzi na ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyab dang
264a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ba ra na se na/ drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags na/ dgra ba
264a7(mdo sde): pa nyid khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i seng ge dang / seng ge blo gros
264a8(mdo sde): dang lags par gnas pa'i blo gros dang / dpe med blo gros dang / sa 'dzin dang / mas byin dang / chu lha dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / phug sras dang / bzang skyong dang / glog lpa
264b1(mdo sde): rnam par snang byed dang / 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa dang / ye shes 'byung gnas dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba dang / mthong ba don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bams
264b2(mdo sde): pa la sogs pa khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / legs par gnas pa'i blo gros la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po pad+ma'i
264b3(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos drag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsigs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba
264b4(mdo sde): btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
264b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ba
264b6(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir/ rtag tu skabs phyes/ pad+ma'i snying po khyod de ban
264b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas/ khyed kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces
264b8(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sem
265a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin
265a2(mdo sde): 'thob cing / ting 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas/ seMn rnams kyi me
265a3(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ngos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'arang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom
265a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi sring po legasolagaso// pad+ma'i dpal gyi
265a5(mdo sde): snying po khyod ni 'di ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya/ ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khra gakhrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ste/ 
265a6(mdo sde): khyod 'di ltar sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje bar zhugs pas pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs la
265a7(mdo sde): den 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pa khyang de'i phyir legs par rab tu zhan la yid la bung gig dang ngas khyod la babad// gang chung sems dpa' sems dpal
265a8(mdo sde): pa'i pal kyi dang bas yangam ldan 'das la lanas shes ga sa mas ldas las kyi nga na pa dang / sam ldan mas kyis dzin la du mas
265b1(mdo sde): bo ros gcig dang ldan ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / sgram
265b2(mdo sde): lta bu'i tinge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing ting 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas/ seMn rnams kyi
265b3(mdo sde): mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuro// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ pad+ma'i dpal
265b4(mdo sde): gyi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum pa thams cad la mi gnas pa yin te/ nang ngam phyi rol la gnas par mi bye'o// gnas med pas yang dag pa mthong bar 'gyur
265b5(mdo sde): yang dag pa mthong bas/ yang dag pa la sbyor bar 'gru yang dag pa la sbyor bas ci la yang blo thogs par mi lu/ ro// de blo thogs pa med pas yang dag pa'i bya ba la skyed
265b6(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/ chos gang yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yino// chos thams cad ni rkyen las
265b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba ste/ rkyen med par 'byung ba'i chos ni gang yang mdo// chos gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de ni ma skyes pa'o// de ltar ni ros thams cad ni skye ba med pa ste/ chos thang ma skyes
265b8(mdo sde): par rtogs par gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa rtags pa 'pho'o// 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po dang snying rje'i sem kyi rdza su 'jug pa
266a1(mdo sde): rab tu 'gro'o// de de ltar mos pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu she so// chos thams cad ni yang su brtags pas sprul pa ste/ yong su brtags pa de yang shes
266a2(mdo sde): stong pa'o// chos thams cad stong par rtogs pa de ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin 'beb ste/ ting 'dzin thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs
266a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji ltar de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
266a4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad
266a5(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin 'di thob pa gang la la dag 'khor 'dir 'dus pa lnga
266a6(mdo sde): mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi 'khor 'di na bsams bzhin du go cha bgos pa gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ringange 'dzin 'di thob po skyes bu
266a7(mdo sde): dam pa drug cu yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la sogs pa skyes bu dag pa drug cu po dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting
266a8(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di thob pa yi no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid snga ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa lags sam/ 'on tu
266b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na yang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin 'di thob pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag kyang mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos
266b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub kyi phyogs cha logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
266b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa
266b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob ces bya ba dang gnyis tingange 'dzin 'di thob pa
266b5(mdo sde): yin te/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzhan dang / nub bdud du 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa de dag sgyu mnya
266b6(mdo sde): bu'i tinge 'dzin thobo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
266b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sgyu ma lta bu'i tingange 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mang du mchiso// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas
266b8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsgrim mi 'tshal bar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dra ba'i lan nyan pa'i slad du'o// bco ldan
267a1(mdo sde): / 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi sring po dza sad zer ba de de bzhin te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin la gnas
267a2(mdo sde): pa dag ni rang med grangs medo// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol te// bco ldan
267a3(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji lta bu'i sems kyi mtshan ma bstan pas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams
267a4(mdo sde): mi mjed 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'jig
267a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di ni dga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'dra la mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ legs par mdzad gsol deni 'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de gnyis
267a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchis na/ byang chub sems dpe'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa des
267a7(mdo sde): las chos 'dri ba'i lan thos pas/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba band dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
267a8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa de yang mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa
267b1(mdo sde): bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang / der skyes ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de nas
267b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos gsol ba gdab par mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ 'od nges stong gsum gyi stong
267b3(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ ri'i tshogs dang / shing ljon pa
267b4(mdo sde): dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po gang dag yod pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun nag de dag thams cad kyang gser
267b5(mdo sde): gyi kha dog gi snang ba des khyab par gyur to// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag kyang mig gi dbang po la sna
267b6(mdo sde): bar ma gyur to// nub phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi 'ang bre brgya stong las thal nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de thams cad gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par chu
267b7(mdo sde): // de nas 'od de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba bya
267b8(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar mi snang bar gyur to// de nas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyes pa'i seMn rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'amangs
268a1(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
268a2(mdo sde): yongasu bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas pa de yang mthong ste/ dper na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa ltar mthong nas/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dag
268a3(mdo sde): rgya cher skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjerjod// 'jig rten gyi kham+bu'i laja
268a4(mdo sde): 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'khor dkyil 'khor du gang dag 'dus pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyengad dang / dge ster
268a5(mdo sde): ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang li dang mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / rangs pa dang / 'jig rten
268a6(mdo sde): slong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dang ga mang byang chub
268a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas te/ ri'i rgyal po bzhin du 'bar ba de dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang sa ler mtho
268a8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pas/ mngom gang tsam gyi phyogs ni/ skyes bu gcig shos kyi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgrim mi dgos par mthong ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang
268b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa mthong // 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba cad yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong nga
268b2(mdo sde): mas gang ba yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa de yang snango // mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyeso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da
268b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshalo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par bstan pa mdzad pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sngon sems ma
268b4(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi sto/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
268b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yo ngasu bsngo'o// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po gang
268b6(mdo sde): 'khod pa de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
268b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la
268b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshalo zhes kyang brjod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i tshe/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
269a1(mdo sde): de rnam pa drug tu 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul// g.yas rab tu g.yos// kun tu rag tu g.yas/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg 'dra'ur rag tu 'a
269a2(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ chem chem/ rab tu chem tsham/ kum du rab tu chem che mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
269a3(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
269a4(mdo sde): 'od dpag med ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo ngos phyag 'tshal te/ zhe sa dang bcas par phyogs gcig tu 'khod// skyes bu dam pa de gnyis
269a5(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
269a6(mdo sde): rgyas shAkya thub pa de mthu brtan pa brnyes pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das
269a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i mtshan brjod pa tsam gyis sems ma mchis pa'i dog sa 'di yang rnam pa drug dug
269a8(mdo sde): pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing
269b1(mdo sde): 'dzin bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsu thub pa'i mtshan rjod par ma zang kyis dang gas ma nas ma
269b2(mdo sde): 'das de'i mtshan yongasu brjod// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang 'od des reg pas rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yo so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag sems can tshad med grangs med pa
269b3(mdo sde): ngag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de
269b4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thoso// thos nas kyang de dag 'a
269b5(mdo sde): 'dus nas mgrin gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sde'o// de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang
269b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par lung bstan to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de la/ byang chub
269b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
269b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sngon ma mthong ma bos pa'i 'od 'di bdang po rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis pA na/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa da
270a1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'di ltar yid du mchi ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi gdong na gang gi sladadu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
270a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des 'di ltar yid mchi ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od bkye ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni si lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang // de bzhin gsheg pa
270a3(mdo sde): 'od dpag med kyis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ rgyu med rkyen med par bcom ldan 'das des 'di ltar
270a4(mdo sde): yid 'ong ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi bkye'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
270a5(mdo sde): pa de dang byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin rin po che bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs sten par 'gyur te// de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das shAkya du
270a6(mdo sde): pa des/ chos bstan pa de'i snga lta su 'di ltar yid 'ong ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od 'di bkye'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
270a7(mdo sde): rgyas 'od dpag med de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen theb kyis 'di skad
270a8(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / 
270b1(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan pa'i sladad/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag pa
270b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de khang nyid las brtsams te/ chos ston par 'gyur gyis de'i dus la nga bab par shes na khyed deng shig ces skabs phye bas/ de nas byang
270b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
270b4(mdo sde): pa 'od dpag med de'i nye 'khor na 'khor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po rnams la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag tshur shegs/ khyed kyang bcom ldan
270b5(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkar bya ba dang
270b6(mdo sde): chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dongango // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
270b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na yod pa spangs nas/ smon lam dang thugs rje chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon
270b8(mdo sde): mongs pa can der byung ste/ sen dman pa la mos pa 'dod chags kyi shas che ba/ zhe sdang gi shas che ba/ gti mug gi shas che ba rnams kyi nang du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo/ 
271a1(mdo sde): // pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni dka' ba mdzad pa'i phyir// skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis/ tshig 'di smras ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi kham
271a2(mdo sde): ba can de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas/ mgrin cig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis bco
271a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i 'tshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag gis sha'i mig gis de mngon sum du mthong la/ mthong
271a4(mdo sde): nas kyang dad pa rnyed pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
271a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad de/ 
271a6(mdo sde): mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed de'i dus la dbab par shes na deng shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzi
271a7(mdo sde): dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongasu bskor nas/ mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi
271a8(mdo sde): khams bde ba can de nas dong // de nas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag thade re re la
271b1(mdo sde): yang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sprul pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byaso// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang gru bzhi lham bka ba bzhi drug pa
271b2(mdo sde): mnyam par legs par rnam par phye ba legs pa zin pa shA sta go// khang pa brtseg pa re re yang 'phang du ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis// rgyar ni dpag tshad brgya do// khang pa brtsegs pa dag gser las
271b3(mdo sde): byas pa dag kyang yod/ dngul las byas pa dag kyang yod/ bai DUr+ya las byas pa dag kyang yod/ shel las byas pa dag kyang yod/ mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug las byas pa
271b4(mdo sde): dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang / sna gnyis pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang bai DUr+ya dang / sna gsum pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang / bai DUrar+ya da
271b5(mdo sde): la dang sna bzhi pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gas dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig dmar po dang sna lnga pa'idab brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dal
271b6(mdo sde): dang bai DUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig dmar po dang spug dang sna drug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / sdug dang
271b7(mdo sde): rdo'i snying po dang sna bdun pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa dag kyang
271b8(mdo sde): yod/ a ga ru dang tsan dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ a ga ru nag po dang tsan dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dan thaMd las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog
272a1(mdo sde): ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ sna ma'i me tog dang / bar sha ka dang / tsam ba ka dang / skya nar dang / a ti
272a2(mdo sde): mug ta ka dang / ta ra ni dang / go ta ra ni las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog da ru ska ri las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog man dar dang / man
272a3(mdo sde): chen po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes
272a4(mdo sde): chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / kun tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang / me tog zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / zla ba mchog dang / sgra
272a5(mdo sde): la dang / sgra la chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i sgra la las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog tha mas cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag
272a6(mdo sde): kyang yod/ kha dog du ma pa/ kha dog sna tshogs kha dog brgya stong dum pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa yongasu dag pa/ 'od gsal ba dag kyang yod// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i
272a7(mdo sde): bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sbrul de na lha'i bu mo cig gi lag na dung dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / pi bang rlung gcig pa dang / glu dbyangs sgra snyan pa dang / gling bu dang / 
272a8(mdo sde): rgyud can pi bang dang / pi dang rgyud gsum pa rnams thogs te/ sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo sgra skad rnam pa mang po de lta bu len cing 'khod// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan da
272b1(mdo sde): dmar de'i phye ma'i pur ma thogs shing 'khod// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan da sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i pur ma thogs shing 'khod// lha'i bu kha cig ni a ga ru nag po dang / tsan dan gyi bye
272b2(mdo sde): ma'i pur ma thegs shing 'khed// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru nag po dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i pur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ri tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma'i pur ma thog
272b3(mdo sde): shing 'khod// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po'i me tog gi phur ma thegs shing 'khod// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog man da ra dang / man da
272b4(mdo sde): chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / me tog mdog mdze sa dang / mdog chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang
272b5(mdo sde): 'khor lo chen po dang / kun tu 'khor lo dang / shing tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang / me tog zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shi/ tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / zla ba mchog dang / sga la dang
272b6(mdo sde): sgra la chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i sga la'i me tog gi pur ma thogs shing 'khod// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog thaMd dang / bdag pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / 
272b7(mdo sde): bye ma'i pur ma thogs shing 'khod// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang bkod pa chen po'i seng+ge'i khri la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa'i
272b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang mu tig dkar po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / mu tig mthon ka'i mu tig gi 'phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi ste
273a1(mdo sde): // mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i ras bcos pa'i rgyal mtshan gser gyi dril bu gser ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stang mngon par sprul / 
273a2(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa re rer yang spos kyi phur ma brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul te// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang gdugs kha dog dum pa kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma bkra ba balnga
273a3(mdo sde): ma sdug pa/ legs par las byas pa dbyibs shin tu legs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba gang dag rlung gis bskyod na 'di
273a4(mdo sde): lta bre'i sgra dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i sil snyan yan lag brgya stong dang ldan pa mkhas pa dag gis legs par blangs nas sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bde
273a5(mdo sde): dag kyang rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan pa yid 'ong ba dag 'byung ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rdzing bu zhig gser gyi bye ma bangal ba/ bai R+Sha
273a6(mdo sde): dang shel gyis spras pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi kha khyer gyis bskor ba me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ ngur pa sgra 'byin pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan po
273a7(mdo sde): chus gang ba/ bya rog gis btung du rung bar mu dang kha da nang du gang ba dag sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i 'phreng ba bdun gyis bskor to// rin po che'i skud pa
273a8(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi sdong gis kun nas dkriso// rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa re rir 'od kyis kyang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du snang bar gyur to// de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa zad kyis bkad
273b1(mdo sde): pa dag so sor bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/ byang chub sems
273b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa ji snyed yod pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na bkod pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad khang pa
273b3(mdo sde): brtsegs pa re rer mngon par sprul to// snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang de ltar bkod pa rnams mngon par sprul nas/ bkod pa de lta bu des/ byang chub sems dpa
273b4(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las bcang ba dang / be rkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis de skad cig pa
273b5(mdo sde): cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas mi sdang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyi
273b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di lag mthil du mnyam par gyur pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byad
273b7(mdo sde): mngon par byas// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag rtsa bzhis yongasu bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ yon tan gyi bkang pa chen po dang ldan pas shin tu
273b8(mdo sde): lhag ge'o// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi 'od kyis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis
274a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
274a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'kho do// pag+sa
274a3(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod nas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gzi brjid
274a4(mdo sde): mtshungs med yon tan phung po gcig la phyag 'tshalo// pra srong chen po kun mkhyen yon tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs thams cad zil gnan srid pa gsum gyi chags pa
274a5(mdo sde): lam las 'das// shAkya khyu mchog dri bral zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshalo// nyi ma dri med lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa rnam par mdzes// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi go cha
274a6(mdo sde): mnabs gyur cing // dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa 'jig rten kun tu gsal// mi mchog khyod mtshungs 'jig rten gsum na gang yang yong ma mchis// bde bar gshegs
274a7(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i 'od kyis gang tshe reg gyur pa// de'i tshe 'jig rten nyi ma zla ba nor bu zhugs rnams dang // brgya byin tshangs pa lha dang de bzhin mi ci rnams kyi 'od// snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du
274a8(mdo sde): mog mig mi snang gsal ma mchis// rgyal ba zhing gcig na ni yang dag bzhugs par gda' bzhin du// 'gro ba'i don du skang cig gcig gis mtha' yas zhing du gshegs// ston par
274b1(mdo sde): bzhud dang byon pa 'tshal ba su yang yong ma mchis// mdzad pa dag dang 'dul ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can 'dul// spu'i khung gcig nang du mnga' yas zhing rnams ston mdzad kyang // le
274b2(mdo sde): ba dang ni bri bar gyur pa gang yang yod ma mchis// 'di ni ji bzhin las dang byed pa rgyu dang 'bras gda' la// sems can rnams la gnod pa ma mchis 'dres par gyur ma mchis// gang na ran
274b3(mdo sde): dmyal bar dud 'gro yi dgas ma mchis shing // rgyal ba'i sras po grags pa chen po dag gis yongs gang la// mi kham brgyad po dag dang bral te mchog tu nyam dga' ba'i// yongs dag
274b4(mdo sde): zhing de dag kyang mi mchog la lar ston pa mdzad// lha mi gang dag mi 'jigs bag ma mchis pa bslang slad// sems dmyal dud 'gro yi dgas 'gro ba shin tu mi bzad pa'i// kun nas
274b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs zhing rnams la la dag kyang bstan mdzad nas// da dag thams cad bde bar gshegs la skyabasu nye bar ma chi// zhing gzhan la la ngag kyang ra mkha' lta bur ston pa ma/ 
274b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gzhan yang zhugs kyis bltam zhing me lce 'khrugs pa dang // zhing gzhan dag kyang chab kyis yongasu bstam par ston pa mdzad// rnam 'phrul 'di ni zad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul
274b7(mdo sde): lag so// 'dul ba'i don tu gzugs kyi rnam pa mtha' yas ston mdzad pa// la lar 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'od chags gzugs dang ldan par gyur// tshangs pa'i bdag po mchog tu
274b8(mdo sde): ba'i ting 'dzin skad pa dang // sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug mig stong rdo rje 'bar ba dang // srog chags brgya phrag mang po rab tu dga' bas ma ched bgyid cing // dge ba bcu po dag gis seMn
275a1(mdo sde): mtha' yas 'dul bgyid pa// blon po tshang dpon ngag dang bka' la gtogs pa'i gtsor gyur cing // shin du 'jigs med dgra tshogs pam nas chad pas mi gcod la/ 
275a2(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pos sems can rnams ni bsdu bgyid cing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub le la sems can rab tu 'jog bgyid pa// bsod nams las kyis rin cher bdun dang ldan pa
275a3(mdo sde): gyur pa yi// gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug 'khor los sbyor ba dag tu gyur// 'jig rten 'di ni la lar bltam pa lta bur stan mdzad// dgas la ni gem pa bdun dag par zhing gshegs nas
275a4(mdo sde): nga ni skyes nas skye dang 'chi ba'i mtha' mar dbyung zhes// yid 'ong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod pa mdzad// mar me mdzad pa tshun chad dri ma thams cad spangs lag kyang
275a5(mdo sde): 'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la yongs smin mdzad sladu// la lar sems can dag pa bdun mo'i 'khor na bzhu gas par gdal// mi yi dbang po btsun me dag dang sra/ 
275a6(mdo sde): kyang ston pa mdzad// yab yum dag dang gnyen gyi rtsa lag sdug pa'i 'khor rnams dang // yul 'khor 'byor dang rin chen gter ma dzad mang po btang mdzad nas// brgya byin tshangs pa dag
275a7(mdo sde): dang lha min rnams kyis phyag bgyis shing // drang srong chen po mngon par byung ste nags na bzhugs par gda'// 'gro la sman slad dgung lo drug tu dka' nga spyad nas ni// bsam gtan ma'
275a8(mdo sde): khyab rin chen mchog la bsam gtan mdzad par gda'// mu stegs can gyi tshogs rnams thams cad tshar gcad mdzad slad// sems can dag pa byang chub shing drung du yang gshegs pa
275b1(mdo sde): gda'// 'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu yongs smin mdzad slad// mi dbang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin mchog la bzhugs mdzad nas// sku yi nul ni gang gis 'jig rten
275b2(mdo sde): rnam par 'dul 'gyur ba// rgyal ba de 'dra nyid kyi sku yi cha lugs 'dzin pa mdzad// ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'gro ba rmongs par bgyi slad// sgyu ma mang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab
275b3(mdo sde): tu sten bgyid pa// de bzhin 'gro ba'i sgron mas sems can 'dul bar mdzad slad// sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mang po rnams kyang ston// thub pa dpa' bo la lar dpung
275b4(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul ston// gang la pha rol mu stegs tshogs kyi 'gro ba ma mchis shing // rdul bral mya ngan ma ma chos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa// bla na med pa
275b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ma mchis 'khor lo rab tu bskor// khyod kyis bskal pa bya ba khrag khrig mang nas byang chub brnyes// phyogs kyi lam rnams thad du yang 'khor lo skor ba mdzad// mi yi
275b6(mdo sde): dbang po kun nas zhal ldan na zla bzhin du bzhugs// bde gshegs rang byung mthas yul la bdag cag phyag 'tshalo// la la dag la sangs rgyas chos kyi sku ni ston mdzad pa// rtag pa
275b7(mdo sde): brtan pa ther zug 'gyur ba ma mchis gyur pa dang // ma bgyis ma skyes dri ma ma mchis 'gog pa ma mchis chos// mig yor 'dra bas phyogs bcu dag ni shin tu rgyas par 'gangs// 
275b8(mdo sde): ring por mi thogs par ni sdug pa dag dang bral 'gyur gyis// 'dus byas 'di la khyed cag yid brtan bya ba'i mi rigs shes// 'gro ba zad rmi lam sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang // mi rtag mi ban
276a1(mdo sde): skad cig par yang la la dag la ston// bde gshegs sku'i 'phrin las mda' dang pha rol yang ma mchis// gsung dang thugs kyi 'jug pa'i spyod yul dag kya
276a2(mdo sde): dpag mi lang // nam mkha' lta bur rgya che tshad ma mchis pa ston mdzad// rgyal ba'i spyod yul sems can rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags// phyogs bcu dag na mchis pA
276a3(mdo sde): sems can ma lus ji snyed pa// de dag shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar shes rab ldan gyur kyang // rgyal po chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang po'i yul tshad ma mchis pa// rgyal ba'i spyod yul thad
276a4(mdo sde): de dag rnams kyis rig mi nus// rdzogs sangs rgya sa kyi ye shes mkha' 'dra pha rol mtha' ma mchis// de ltar rgyal ba'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ma lus pa/ 
276a5(mdo sde): 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang ni// rkyen gyi rgyal ba 'dus pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags// de ltar 'di dag la sogs
276a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas thabs dang ldan pa yis// 'dul ba'i don du sku yi mdzad pa mtha' yas ston par mdzad// na mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par mtha' yas sku dang ldan gyur pa// / 
276a7(mdo sde): mgon po rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral li phyag 'tshal li// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu rgal gyur pa// nyon mongs thul ba 'gro ba'i gcel bstod pa yi// 
276a8(mdo sde): bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus pa// byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
276b1(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigasu bcad pa dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ 
276b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das la
276b3(mdo sde): gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol lo nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyun gsol lo// 'di skad ces bcom ldan
276b4(mdo sde): kyi nyan thos dag 'jig rten gyi khams nyams dga' la ltar stsol cig ces kyang gsung// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan
276b5(mdo sde): chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po des yongasu khyab pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs dag kyang mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing de
276b6(mdo sde): dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas/ 'dir lhags pa 'di dag ci/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'am/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
276b7(mdo sde): chen po 'di dag gi mthu yin snyamo// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
276b8(mdo sde): ces gsol to// 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs brgyan cing yongasu khyab par gda' ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gsheg
277a1(mdo sde): / pa mchog du ngo mtshar to// gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba dran nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lpags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu lags
277a2(mdo sde): sam/ 'o nga byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gri snying ba
277a3(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa du mas brgyan cing yongs khyab par snang ba 'di ni
277a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma yin gyi/ 'di ni byang nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzig sa dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
277a5(mdo sde): mthu chen thob kyi mthu yi no// gsol pa 'di dag gi mthus/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongasu khyab par gda' ba ni/ 
277a6(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam ngag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongasu spangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tung
277a7(mdo sde): mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs
277a8(mdo sde): med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongasu sbyangs pa yino// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pa skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin thob pa yin te/ 'di gnyis sgyu ma lta bu'i
277b1(mdo sde): 'dzin la gnas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa 'di la bu 'di dag ston to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyad yang shar gyi phyogs cha log su den ci snang ltos shig// de nas byang chu
277b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig sgrib pa med pas bltas na/ shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi byem
277b3(mdo sde): snyed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung bye ma snyed mthong // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
277b4(mdo sde): spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob gnyis phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
277b5(mdo sde): pa~M yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dang / ga med/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gso'o// nyam nga ba nung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stos
277b6(mdo sde): dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snun gsolo zhes smra'o// de bzhin du lho'i phyogs cha dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun
277b7(mdo sde): ngasangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po du mas brgyan cing yongasu khyab par mthong // sangs rgyas kyi
277b8(mdo sde): de dag thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal
278a1(mdo sde): ba yang mthong // mthong nas kyang de shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po mtshar du gyur nas
278a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de 'di gnyis kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'ad
278a3(mdo sde): ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to// de ci'i slad zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ti nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na dga' ba'i slad
278a4(mdo sde): du'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdza 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ byang nub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos phyogs bcu
278a5(mdo sde): kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skye/ sa bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
278a6(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de bzhin du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na
278a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu mo pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi zhibs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / mthong nas kyang bsam ldan 'das kyis
278a8(mdo sde): 'khor srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad// de nas
278b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang las bla na med pa yang dag
278b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid cig lags// de'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
278b3(mdo sde): kyis legs par bstan/ tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang de'i bya ba dang / de'i spyod pa dang / de'i smon lam yongasu rdzogs pa
278b4(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur te/ de lta bas na pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom ldan
278b5(mdo sde): 'das leg so zhes gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces pa ka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying ba sngan byung ba 'das
278b6(mdo sde): dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong gi rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa// de snyed du chad
278b7(mdo sde): med pa/ de snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji tsam yod pa de bas kyang ches mang ba'i bskal pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen brtsegs pa
278b8(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa bde ba kun ston pa zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs ldan pa bde bar ga
279a1(mdo sde): / pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi'i ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'ang sa rnam par ral pa'i rgyal po
279a2(mdo sde): babyung ste/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od sang+ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i
279a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de dag dpe cung zad cig brjod par byas nyon cig/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
279a4(mdo sde): mang bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mang ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang
279a5(mdo sde): lag so// bsam gyis mi khyab tshad ma mchis te/ ngag gi las kyis lan gdab par sla ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di lnga
279a6(mdo sde): ste dper na/ mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu blang
279a7(mdo sde): pa dang lhag ma lus pa de gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das blang ba ni nyung / lhag ma lus pa ni tshad ma mchi so// bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod mos par bya'o// 
279a8(mdo sde): khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o// mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mo des rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa ji snyed pa de tsam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
279b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ad dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po ji snyed pa de tsam du/ bcom ldan 'das de ba'in
279b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgya rtsa zhing yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa/ bde ba ku
279b3(mdo sde): tra ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan bkod par blta'o// de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag tu med de/ ji ltar da lta na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos
279b4(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med do zhes byas na/ de las brgya stang du bsgres pa bas kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser
279b5(mdo sde): da seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal ba de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ches mang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun kyang de snyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
279b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa de ni theg pa gsum kho na la sa brtsams te chos ston to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po nges bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhir gshegs
279b7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'ong seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos kyi yan ngan pas
279b8(mdo sde): pa dang / bde ba'i rgyu las brtsams te/ chos bstan par 'dod kyang / nga'i spobs pa yang zad par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de'i mthar phyin par yang mi
280a1(mdo sde): // 'gyur// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i gsung rab la/ 'jig na
280a2(mdo sde): gyi khams steng gi dbang phyug chos dang ldan pa chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi
280a3(mdo sde): gzi brjid de la bu bye ba phrag brgya yod/ rgyal bu gzhon de dag thams cad kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshana'i shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par gyur to// de dag thams cang bla na
280a4(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi yongasu longs spyod pa'i
280a5(mdo sde): bskyed mos tshal ni bdun khri drug stong yod do// rgyal bu re re la yang longs spyod kyi skyod mos tshal khri khri yod do// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
280a6(mdo sde): pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ni med do// 
280a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing da ni/ bud med kyi ming mi grags te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang tshangs par spyod pa las gyur pa rdzus te byung ba sha sta go// sems can thams
280a8(mdo sde): cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni kha zas rags pa med par gyur to// pad+ma'i d+yAl gyi snying po dpal gyi gzi
280b1(mdo sde): brjid de ni las gzhan med de/ bu de rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das de la lo bye ba stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bsnyen bkur byaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
280b2(mdo sde): pa des de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa yang dag par rab tu bstan to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po rad med pa'i phyag rgya
280b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ spyod pa tshad med pa dag don tu gnyer bar mi bya ba de
280b4(mdo sde): gang yang med do// rtul pa tshad med pa gang dag brtsams par mi bya ba de gang yang mdo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni tshad med/ tshul khrims ni ma
280b5(mdo sde): med/ bzod pa ni tshad med/ brtson 'grus ni tshad med/ bsam gtan ni tshad med/ shes rab ni tshod med/ 'khor ba sangs rgyas 'dzin po ni tshad med sems can dag la byam
280b6(mdo sde): pa ni tshad med// zhing gi bkod pa dag ni tshad med/ nyan thos dag ni tshad med/ gzugs yongasu grub pa ni tshad med/ dbyangs ni tshad med/ spobs pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir// 
280b7(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na sems bskyed pa gcig gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad tshad med pa nyid du yongasu sngo'o/ 
280b8(mdo sde): ji ltar yongasu bsdus pas tshad med par 'gyur zhe na/ gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la yongasu sngo bar byed pa/ da'i tshe sems can 'di dag thams cad sleb mad pa mngon sa
281a1(mdo sde): rgyas su mas mas kyi rnams ma su sa ma ga
281a2(mdo sde): mas pa /  sos su mnas khams bdun mang bag byu ces thams cad nam rgyas pam 'thamam las drug mi ma
281a3(mdo sde): na kyi sa dpa'/ dbu dpal kyi snang ba de'idzin gagags pa dag brnam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gamir 'ang sa rnarnam par me pa'i rgyal
281a4(mdo sde): rnal ba dpal gyi gaji brjid de la na mang pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul lamangs pa/ 'di yang ba/ par ragadu stan pa/ ngas kyang mas ca med pa dag
281a5(mdo sde): sems par byas par gyur to// nas rgyal po dpal tshug ni brjid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de las chos dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ tshis zhing mgu / 
281a6(mdo sde): rangs nas/ rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// 'dren pa chos
281a7(mdo sde): rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba// smra ba'i tshogs kun yang dag rab tu 'jom// bdud kyi rtsod dang nyon mongs kun sel ba// mtshungs med ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshalo// nyi zla dag dang
281b1(mdo sde): ma'i 'od rnams dang // rgya byin sangs pa nong bu glog 'ang rnams// bad ga shegs gaji brjid kyis ni ma ga mug gyur/ mi mchog 'ang mdzad pa la phyag 'ama'o// thub pa bskal pa rnam
281b2(mdo sde): 'das par yang / dka' ba rnam pa du ma spyad pa mdzad// 'phrin las de'i 'bras bu yid 'ong ste// des na 'gro bas bltas na ngoms mi 'gyur// snyi dang rga dang na dang 'chis gtses shing / 
281b3(mdo sde): sems can sdug bsngal mang ngos gzir gzigs nas// de dag rnams la dub chen thugs rje ste// rtag tu mi 'pho zhi ba'i chos kyang ston// sring gsum sreg chags kun gyi sman pa
281b4(mdo sde): 'dra/ 'ad chags zhe sdang mun pa thams cad skyong / thugs rje bskyed pa mdzad nas chos kyi sman// zhi ba bla na ma dpa rag tu sten// sems can kun gyi sbyid pa rab
281b5(mdo sde): mkhyen// rab 'bum zhing rnams kun na srog chags kyi// mkhyen nas gang gis mya ngan 'das mchog la// reg par 'gyu ra ba de 'dra'i chos kyang ston// mi mchog khyod kyi thugs
281b6(mdo sde): rje ci 'dra ba// ji snyed rab 'byam zhing gi nyan thos dang // rkyen byung thub pa ma lus de dag la// de 'dra ba'i snying rje yong ma mchis// bsod nams phung po mtshan mchog rnams dang
281b7(mdo sde): ldan/ rgyal ba'i su ni gser gyi ri bo 'dra// bye ba gnyis las lhag pa'i gzi mnga' ba// mi mchog mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tsha'o// chos sprin brgya las chos char 'a
281b8(mdo sde): pa na// gang dag rgya chen mos pa spyod yul ba// sngon gyi sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis// de dag rtag tu bde gshegs mdun ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
282a1(mdo sde): / bsam ya su// mi mchog mthong ba rnyed par shin/ tra dka'// bsod nams las kyis bsam pa yongs sbyangs pa// de dag mig lam rnam par 'dren rnams
282a2(mdo sde): dga'// rgyal ba'i sku ni chos dbyings rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnams rab 'byam thad na yang gda'// bzhud dang byon par mngon pa yong ma mchis// 'on kyang 'jig rten dag na
282a3(mdo sde): snod bzhin gda'// bden pa gzigs shing don dam ston pa po// chos kyi sprin bdag zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa// brgal nas srog chags bcings gyur gzhan sgrol ba// bde ba
282a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa la phyag 'ar lo// khyod kyis skye ba'i shing ljon rtsa nas bton// nga rgyal ri bo sra ba rdul du blags/ rgod pa mi mnga' g.yo dang sgra dang bral// rab ni thugs dang ldan la
282a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshalo// mi mchog chags pa thams cad yong mi ma nga'// dgongs pa sa dang du dang me dang 'dra// rgyal ba sems can kun li snyoms thugs ldan// rlung dang nama'
282a6(mdo sde): 'dra la phyag 'tshalo// thub pa chen po yon tan 'di 'dra'i gter// bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan// bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu de brjod kyang kayon tan rgya mtsho zad
282a7(mdo sde): par nus ma lags// yon tan mnga' ba lnga mis mchod pa la// bdag ni bu dang bcas te mchod pa bgyid// rgyal ba mchod pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa// des ni thub pa chen po
282a8(mdo sde): khyod 'drar shog/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dus gzhan zhig na// bskyed mos tshal na bsam gtan gyi gnas pas gnas shing 'dug pa'i grwa
282b1(mdo sde): g.yas g.yon nas tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i pad+ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa dag pa gnyis 'byung // pad+ma de gnyis las khye'u ming rin chen sems dang rin ren mchog ces bya ba
282b2(mdo sde): gnyis rdzus te byung nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid // ting 'dzin de las langs nas khye'u gnyis skyil mo kru
282b3(mdo sde): bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang nigasuM bcad pa 'di smraso// khyod gnyis lha 'am klu yin nam// gnod sbyin dri za mi 'am ci// mi 'am mi ma yin nam ci// dri ba smos
282b4(mdo sde): shig grogs po dag/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi g.yas phyogasu byung ba'i khyi 'u gang yin pa des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid
282b5(mdo sde): la tshigasu bcad smras pa/ grogs po chos kun stong pa yi// ming ni 'dri bar byed dam ci// chos rnams thams cad ming med na// gang gi ming ni 'dri bar byed// stong nyid
282b6(mdo sde): gang la lha med cing // klu med srid bu yong ma yin// mi 'am mi ma yin yang rung // thad de na yong mdo// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas khye'u gcig shos des// rgyal po dpal gyi
282b7(mdo sde): gzi brjid de la tshigasu be cang smras pa/ ming ni ming gis stong pa ste// ming la ming ni yod ma yin// chos rnams thams cad ming med// 'on kyang ming gis yongasu brjod// ming gir
282b8(mdo sde): bzhin gang yin pa// des nam mthong ma thoso// las kyis 'gags pa ma yin na// 'di na gang gi ming zhig 'dri/ tha snyad du ni ming byas nas// ming bdags byas te bstan pa ni/ 
283a1(mdo sde): kho bo'i ming ni rin chen sems// gcig shos rin chen mchog ces bya// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u gnyis kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras te/ mngon par
283a2(mdo sde): shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas// rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od se
283a3(mdo sde): rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ thal mo smra
283a4(mdo sde): te phyogs gcig tu 'khod// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu tshigs bcad gsol pa// pad+ma dag dang dri gda' dang // me tog 'phreng dang na ban
283a5(mdo sde): 'am// 'on te zas dang skom gyis sam// rgyal ba ji lta ra mchod par bgyi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang gnyis ga co// ji ltar mchod par 'gyur ba lags// don 'di legs
283a6(mdo sde): par bstan du gsol// 'dren pa thos nas 'tshal bar bgyi// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des khye'u de
283a7(mdo sde): gnyis la tshigs bcang bka' stsal pa/ lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas dag la mchod pa
283a8(mdo sde): 'gyur// mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas zhing // gang gi'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag/ me tog rnams kyis bkang byas te// 'jig rten mgon po phul ba bas// gang gis 'di ni thal sbyar nas/ 
283b1(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems btud na// 'di ni bsod nams ches mang ste// de la tshad ni yod ma yin// byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba// de ltar blo mchog gis bstan pa// de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang med// 
283b2(mdo sde): de 'dra ba'i dpal yang med// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khe'u de gnyis kyi slar yang bcom ldan 'das de la tshigasu bcad gsol pa// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// bdag cag yi
283b3(mdo sde): dam yang dag 'chas// bla na med pa'i seng+ge'i sgra// lha dang mi dag gsan mdzod cig/ ji sridadu ni 'khor ba yi// sngon gyi mtha' ni mi dmigs pa// de srid bskal pa du mar yang // sen phyir ni spang
283b4(mdo sde): bgyi/ ji tsam sngon gyi mtha' dran pa// rnam grangs 'di'i tshul dag gis// soni kun la phan pa'i phyir// de srid bskal pa spyang par bgyi// gal te de ring sman mad// 'did chags kyi ni sems byung na/ 
283b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams ni bslus par 'gyur// de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang // phrag dag ser sna'ang de bzhino// rtag tu dben pa'i tshig smra zhing // brdzud
283b6(mdo sde): gyi tshig ni spang bar bgyi// gal te de ring sman chadadu// rdul med byang chub ma thob par// bdag cag nyan thos sems gyur na// des ni brdzun du smra bar 'gyur// rnams kyang rang sangs rgyas ni/ bdeg
283b7(mdo sde): cag dga' bar mi bgyid// sen rnams la snying rje zhing // bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi// ji ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhing // grub pa rnam pa 'di dag las// gzhan du sngon bye ba rnyed// phun su
283b8(mdo sde): tshogs pa'i zhing du bgyi// de na nyan thos gang yang med// rang rgyal 'dren pa dag kyang med// de tshe bya ba'i tshad med pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gnas// bde ba 'di dang ldan pa yi/ 
284a1(mdo sde): // skye bo dri ma med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzod ni bzung bas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyin to// gal te 'di dag gzhan min par// de bzhin du ni 'gyur nges na// rgya mtsho
284a2(mdo sde): bcas dang rir bcas pa'i// sa 'di tha~Md g.yos par shog/ tshig 'di smras pa'i mo la ni// sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur// sil sran dag ni ma dkrol bar// de na thams cad sgra yang 'byis
284a3(mdo sde): stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis/ me tog char dang phye ma'i char// spos kyi char ni yid 'ong dang // na bza' bye ba rag tu pab// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i dus na// rgyal po dngalaM gyi ga
284a4(mdo sde): brjid ces bya bar gyur pa de// gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du ngogs sam// yid gnyis za na de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / 
284a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khye'u rin chen
284a6(mdo sde): sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba de gnyis gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de yang de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan sa
284a7(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni/ khye'u rin chen mchog ces bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob 'di ni khye'u rin chen sems shes bya bar gyur to// 
284a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa ni de yino// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sa ma
284b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ji tsam du zab mo la mos par gyur pa dang / gang gi ming yang ma dmi
284b2(mdo sde): pa de sridadu/ 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la
284b3(mdo sde): rim gro bgyis par gyur na/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang+gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pharo/ 
284b4(mdo sde): na sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni de lta ma yin te/ de srid 'di gni sa kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed// skyes bu dam pa
284b5(mdo sde): 'di gnyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos shing yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan te 'di gnyis kyi yon tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nuso// de nas bcom ldan 'a
284b6(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa/ bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi
284b7(mdo sde): ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng+ge'i rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de 'di nas phyogs gang logs na mchis/ bcom ldan 'a
284b8(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs na ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan chen po bsags pa dpag
285a1(mdo sde): / tu med pa/ bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces
285a2(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / 'jig rten la thugs brje ba dang / skye bo phal
285a3(mdo sde): tshe dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde bar bgyi ba'i slad/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa
285a4(mdo sde): 'dra ba dang / tshe ji tsam pa dang / long spyod ci 'dra ba dang / 'od ci 'a dra ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
285a5(mdo sde): mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba de dag legs par bstan tu gsol// de ci'i slad zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam chen po bshang
285a6(mdo sde): bos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang smon lam chen po yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i sla'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i
285a7(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshado// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi ste
285a8(mdo sde): ngos bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'ong
285b1(mdo sde): dpag med kyi tshe'i chad ni dpag tu med/ de'i mtha' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du bshad kyang rtog par sla ba ma yino// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
285b2(mdo sde): med kyi tshe dpag tu med du zin kyang 'das byas pade mi rtag pa mi brtan pa ther zug ma yin pa/ yun du gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'das pa de'i tshe de'i du
285b3(mdo sde): sabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyuraro// de yongasu mya ngan las 'das na
285b4(mdo sde): kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad du rtsa bzhi'i bar du de'i dam pa'i chos gnas te/ ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / sen
285b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu grub ste/ lhag chad mid par 'gyuraro// gzhan du na sems can rnams de bzhin ge she/ gas pa de mthong ba med par zad// byang chub sems dpa
285b6(mdo sde): de dag kyang sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i tingange 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur/ de dag tu rgyun mi chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyuro// rigs kyi bu 'od dpag tu med yongasu mya
285b7(mdo sde): ngan las 'das nas kyang / rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag dang / shing ljon pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du pad+ma dag dang / shing ljon pa de dag las
285b8(mdo sde): kyang chos kyi sgo brgya phrag du ma 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos nub ma thag pa'i mtshan mos
286a1(mdo sde): rang 'char ba'i dus kyi me byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chad pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rin po che dum bkod pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas/ drwa
286a2(mdo sde): med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po
286a3(mdo sde): zhes bya bar 'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal 'artsegs rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dgan
286a4(mdo sde): de ba'in gshegs pas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed du/ bstan kyang mtha' rtogs par mi nus// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i bde ba'i rgyu dang / yon tan gyi rgyu ni de snyed 'gyur ro// 
286a5(mdo sde): kyi 'on kyang rigs kyi bu dpe tsam du cung zad cig bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gsera'od seng+ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas
286a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa yon gyi bkod pa 'di dag gi brgya'i char yang mi chog/ stong gi ma dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi brjod
286a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming yang med par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nga ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gis gang bar 'gyur// rigs kyi
286a8(mdo sde): bu da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed po de dag thaM bsdus kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
286b1(mdo sde): pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi brgya'i char yang mi chog ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpe
286b2(mdo sde): rgyur yang mi bzed// de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug du 'gyuraro// de'i dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bye ba drug cu rtsa gsum du gnas pa 'gyur
286b3(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de'i
286b4(mdo sde): ming yang bde ba can zhes bgyi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rin chen kun nas bas
286b5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang zer kun ras 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po'itshe ji srid gnas pa nas bzung ste/ yongasu mya ngan las
286b6(mdo sde): 'das pa de srid/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob mchod pa byed par 'gyuro// yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ de'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos yun
286b7(mdo sde): ring por gnas par bya ba'i phyir spro bar 'gyuraro// phyi ma'i dus der dam pa'i chos nub nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rje
286b8(mdo sde): par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa
287a1(mdo sde): mabu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes pa
287a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpel brtsegs rgyal
287a3(mdo sde): po de'i byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa dang / snang ba phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu rjeg
287a4(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po de'i yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ lhag rang med cing shin tu lhag pa med par 'gyuro// de'i yun dang / dam pa'i chos gnas pa yang de srid 'gyuro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
287a5(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gabye pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de dang / bcom ldan 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa ston
287a6(mdo sde): shin tu gnas pa/ nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyu ro// pad+ma'i dpal
287a7(mdo sde): gyi snying po bud med gang la las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od sad+ma rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de dang / ma 'ongs pa de gnyis
287a8(mdo sde): kyi mtshan thos na/ de bud med kyi rang bzhin du mi 'gyuraro// bskal pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcur 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
287b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ che rjes nas kyang rab tu 'byung ba thob par 'gyur/ tshe rabs drad pa
287b2(mdo sde): dang / spongs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur/ gzungs kyang thob par 'gyu ro// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi dang skye dgu'i srog chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis mgrin
287b3(mdo sde): gcig tu tshig smras pa dang / gang dag ma byon pa de dag dang / gang dag da lta bzhugs pa mtsho zhing gzhes pa de dag dang / phyogs bcu na gang dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de ba'i/ 
287b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa de dag la phyag 'tshalo// de dag gi mtshan gang lags pa de dag la yang rdza su yi ngo // tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te// bcom ldan 'das bdag ca
287b5(mdo sde): lhan cig tshogs pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes smraso// de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag pa
287b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// srog chags khrag khrig brgya phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgo// dge slong bdun
287b7(mdo sde): stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las rnam par gro'o// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang byang chub sems dpa' me
287b8(mdo sde): chen thob kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas// bde dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis phyogs bcu na/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pade
288a1(mdo sde): // ngag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stong pa mthong ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par bso// mngang nas cang / 
288a2(mdo sde): skad ces 'dzer te/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis legs par yongasu bzung ba lag
288a3(mdo sde): te'adi ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed cig gis lung stor pa ni ngo mtshar to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i parjid
288a4(mdo sde): gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pas gsu nges pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 
288a5(mdo sde): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rag tu stan pa de'i bsod nams ji skad cig 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
288a6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la yongasu 'dri ba'i gtam 'dis ci zhig bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can dben pa la mos pa de dag de bzhin
288a7(mdo sde): gshegs pas gsungs pa la yid mi ches par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar 'di dag yun ring gnod pa dang / phan pa med pa dang / bde ba med pa dang / log par ltung bar 'gyuro// gsol pa
288a8(mdo sde): bac+doMs 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag rgya chen po la mos pa dang / mas pa mang ba dag kyang mchis/ slad ma'i skye bo rnams la yang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur na/ deba'i
288b1(mdo sde): gshegs pas skye ba mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad bshad par gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de phyir legs pa ma
288b2(mdo sde): na la yang la zung yig dang ba // byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pas/ bcom ldan 'das lags zhes gsol ro/ com ldan ras kyi ltang can pa dang
288b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ rigs kyi bu 'di la mi gang la la stabs dang ldan pa mthu dang ldan pa/ bsang rnams kyi phung po dang ldan pa TIg byung ste/ ji tsam sen gyi
288b4(mdo sde): su gdags pas gtag pa'i sems pa'i sems can gyi khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ches mang bar gsungs kyi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin te/ sems can de dag tham cad
288b5(mdo sde): bsal pa bye ba mtha' yas mu med par mgo bo 'am khrag param lag pa na thogs te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de dag la gos dang zas dag byin te/ bde ba'i yo byad bad kyis
288b6(mdo sde): rim gror byed/ bla mar byed na/ dad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel las/ gsal pa/ ser gcig la yang se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig byams
288b7(mdo sde): sems kyis khyad par bgyis na de tsam gyis kyang bsod nams mang du skye na/ bskal pa bya ba mtha' yas mu ma mchis par sems can thams cad bzung ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams snad kyi
288b8(mdo sde): rim gro bgyis pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo
289a1(mdo sde): // sde 'di lta bu 'di byang chub kyi sems la gnas te len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun nub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu
289a2(mdo sde): mo dad pa la zhugs pa/ mos pa mang ba dag gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces pas
289a3(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / bdag gis blang bar bgyi/ bzung bar bgyi/ bas
289a4(mdo sde): bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub se mas dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos tshig da
289a5(mdo sde): skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu pa cu rtsa drug gis dbyangs gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smraso// deHma ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang mdo sde'i
289a6(mdo sde): lta bu 'di blang bar bgyi/ bzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klags par bgyi/ kun nub par bgyi/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan
289a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bud med kyis thos ma thag tu bud med kyi
289a8(mdo sde): bo las 'gyur te/ rgyu gnyis ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ phrag dog dang ser sna'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha'i bul
289b1(mdo sde): stong du ma ngag gis lnga'i me tog man dar ba dag bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la mngon par gtor to// lha'i sil ska bye ba khrag khrig
289b2(mdo sde): stong bsil nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang 'dzer to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa dang / legs par ton nas 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rma cher yang da
289b3(mdo sde): par rab tu ston pa'i sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa leg so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
