369b1(mdo sde): zhing che la mar me phul ba las// mthu 'byung gang yin de ni de yin// mar me 'dra ba dag la sems can kun/ lhag byas gal te mthu chen don dam mthong // rang rgyal rnamasu gyur la dam
369b2(mdo sde): phyir// gcig 'gas mar me 'bar bar byas gyur la// mar me skyeng ba ri rab tsam pas shing // de yis 'jig rten ma lus snang byed la// rnam pa de 'dras mtha' yas phyogs kun tu// 
369b3(mdo sde): gal te mar me dbul bar byed gyur la// rang rgyal byang chub tu ni smon sems kyis// bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas 'bar bar byed// gang zhig byang chub phyir ni smon sems kyis// 
369b4(mdo sde): mchod rten mchog la rtsa mos gsal byed na// de bas de ma chog 'bras bu ches che zhing // don dam gzigs pa sangs rgya sa rnams gsung // phyogs bcu'i skye bo gang dag dpa
369b5(mdo sde): med pa/ rang sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir/ re res de bzhin mar me rnams phul zhing // bskal pa grang med de dag 'bar byed la// 'jig rten cha du bde gshegs
369b6(mdo sde): nyid 'dod cing // gang zhig 'jig rten dam pa'i mchod rten la// mar me 'bul lam lan cig phyag 'tshal na// de bas 'di bsod 'bras bu khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas spod yul
369b7(mdo sde): mthong dka' bas mi khyab// thos nas dang dang dga' ba skyed par byed// dang med chos mchog ma thob byis pa rnams// zhum num por ni shin tu byed par 'gyur// de phyir 'jig rten kun man
369b8(mdo sde): gang yin pa// ngag chos spyod yul can rnams rnyed dka' bas// thub rnams sman sngar shin tu dang sems kyis// sangs rgyas nyid kyi che smon lam thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
370a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas// tshe dang ldan pa shAri la bu dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor da dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten mi rangs te/ ba
370a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa mar ma dngul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// 
370a3(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan pa pradz+nyA war ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas sbyar cing nus te/ gtan la phab bo// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya karma A \u0f7f
370a4(mdo sde): ra Na pra ti sa ba d+hi na ma me hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
370a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos bdus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yad na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sprin gyi
370a6(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas sangs rgyas
370a7(mdo sde): kyi mabus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs nas/ bla gos drag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde
370a8(mdo sde): lagasu thal mo sbyang ba bdudade/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs
370b1(mdo sde): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
370b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas las kyi sgrib pa rnams ji ltar so sor bshags par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// 
370b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
370b4(mdo sde): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
370b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsums/ lan gsum du/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ thal
370b6(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig 'di skad/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / 
370b7(mdo sde): sman pa dang bde ba'i sladadu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
370b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa
371a1(mdo sde): chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi rnga rab tu rdung ba/ chos kyi rnga bo cha rab tu rdung ba/ chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa/ chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/ sems can thams ca
371a2(mdo sde): la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/ nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i gnas
371a3(mdo sde): phyag bgyi ba'i gnas/ ri mo bgyi ba'i gnas/ mkhyen par gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag la/ bdag mgo dang / 
371a4(mdo sde): ngag dang / yid kyis phyag 'tshalo// thog ma dang tha ma ma mchi sa pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ bdag 'dod chags kyis gzir ba 'am// zhe sdang gis gzir ba/ gti
371a5(mdo sde): mug gis gzir ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis las kyi sgrib pa gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa/ sangs rgya sum 'tshal ba dang / chosu ma 'tshal ba dang / dge 'dun du ma
371a6(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dang / dge ba dang / mi dge bar ma 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / chos spangs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dben bgyis pa dang // 
371a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun dgra bcom pa bkum pa dang / pha ma bkum pa dang / lus kyi rnam gsum/ ngag gi rnam bzhi/ yid kyi rnam gsum ste/ mi dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam bgyis pa dang / 
371a8(mdo sde): bgyid spel pa dang / bgyid pa la rdza su yi rang ba dang / sems can kha cig la ngag sring po smras pa dang / skar pa btab pa dang / srang la g.yo bgyis pa dang / gzhal ba la g.yo
371b1(mdo sde): bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba drug tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na pha ma mi dga' bar bgyis pa dang / gang zag gi 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'am/ dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi na
371b2(mdo sde): brkus pa dang / ji ltar bslab pa'i bzhi bcas pa rnams kyi 'dul ba dang 'gal ba bgyis pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyis bsgo ba ma mnyan pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang
371b3(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams
371b4(mdo sde): la maM snyan par bgyis pa dang / spros pa dang / brdegs pa dang / de dag lo tha ba dang / zhe sdang bskyed pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna las byung ba'i sems kyis/ sangs rgyas
371b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams la tshig rtsub po smras pa dang / chos la chos ma lags shes bgyis pa dang / chos ma lags pa la chos lags shes bgyis pa de dag sangs rgyas
371b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par gyur pa/ spun du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzig pa dang ldan pa/ de dag gi spyan sngar so sor 'chags
371b7(mdo sde): 'pho'o// mi 'ang po// slan chad kyang mi bgyid// bdag las kyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs te/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma
371b8(mdo sde): yin gyi tshogs kyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mnyes pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi khom pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'i las de lus 'di
372a1(mdo sde): // nyid la rnam par smin te/ gzhan du mi myong bar shog shig/ de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par gyur pa/ spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa// mkhyen par
372a2(mdo sde): ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag gi spyan sngar so sor 'chag so// 'tholo// mi 'cha'o// slan chad kyang mi bgyid// ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
372a3(mdo sde): sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang / ma bcas pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chag so// 'grolo// mi 'chago/ 
372a4(mdo sde): slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'am/ 
372a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'chab pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chag so// 'grolo// mi 'jabo// slan chad mi bgyi do// ji ltar da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig
372a6(mdo sde): rten na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags pa dang / mi 'chab pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las
372a7(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chag so// 'tholo// mi 'cha'o// slan chad mi bgyidado// ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
372a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spyod pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang / so sor 'chags pa dang / so sor 'chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrub
372b1(mdo sde): pa rnams so sor 'chag so// 'tholo// mi 'cha'o// slan chad mi bgyid// zhes brjod par bya'o// shA rI'i bu de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa rnam pa
372b2(mdo sde): dag pa thob par 'dad pas/ 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'chab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyal rigs kyi rigs shing sa la chen po lta
372b3(mdo sde): bu phyug pa/ nor che ga longs spyod chags la sbram dang / nor dang / yo byad mang bar bya'o// shin tu skyid pa bzhon pa chen po la zhon pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'dod pa des kyang / 'di
372b4(mdo sde): bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa ra bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu rnams dang / khyim
372b5(mdo sde): bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu phyug pa/ nor che ba/ long spyod chags le sbram dang / nor dang / yo byad mang ba/ shin tu skyid pa/ gzhon pa chen po la zhon pa rnams kyi nang du skye ba
372b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhu// 
372b7(mdo sde): dang mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
372b8(mdo sde): rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// de
373a1(mdo sde): bzhin du 'thab bral dang / dgara' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gnan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs
373a2(mdo sde): dang 'ang rlung dang / tshad med 'ong dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rlung dang / tshad med dag dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / sems can 'dums
373a3(mdo sde): med pa dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du
373a4(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su gzugs med pa na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba
373a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye ba ra 'gro ba rnams dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min
373a6(mdo sde): skye mche du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang // 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi ba
373a7(mdo sde): par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
373a8(mdo sde): byed par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rigs pa gsum 'am/ mngon
373b1(mdo sde): par shes pa drug gam/ stobs rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nyan thos dbang che bar grags pa 'am/ rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di na
373b2(mdo sde): du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang / 
373b3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di
373b4(mdo sde): bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshegs par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas ros thams
373b5(mdo sde): cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te/ rgyu dang rkyen gzhan dang / gzhan gyis ga zhan skye'o// gzhan 'gago// de la 'das pa'i chos gang
373b6(mdo sde): yin pa de dag ni 'gags pa zad pa bral ba/ rnam par gyur pa ste/ de dag la yang las kyi sgrib pa chung zad kyang medo// da ltar 'du byed pa gang yin pa rnams kyang med pa
373b7(mdo sde): las byung ba ste/ de dag la yang las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad ni stong pa/ sems can med pa/ srog
373b8(mdo sde): med pa/ gang zag med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ 'dus ma byas pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyiraro// shA ri'i bu chos thams cad bdag las byung yang bdag kyang yod pa ma
374a1(mdo sde): / yi na// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di lta ste/ sems can med pa'i mtha'i ros kyi tshul 'di la 'jug pa 'di ni/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyu
374a2(mdo sde): gcod pa zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni so sor bshags pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
374a3(mdo sde): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ 
374a4(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'dang rgya ba 'tshal bas/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa de rnams la rdzas
374a5(mdo sde): yi rang bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
374a6(mdo sde): kyi bu mos nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum du/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas rig 'di skad du/ 
374a7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i
374a8(mdo sde): bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'dus bgyis pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rango // rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso ba dang / khad par
374b1(mdo sde): can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / stag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rje su yi rang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenan
374b2(mdo sde): sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon pa
374b3(mdo sde): 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la rjesu yi rang ba mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ngar gyis rje su yi ngo // phyogs bcu'i
374b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten na/ sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams
374b5(mdo sde): dgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid pa de dag thams cad la rdza su yi rang ba mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ba
374b6(mdo sde): gyis rje su yi rang // byang chub sems dpa' gang da lta na sems dang po bskyed pa de dag gi dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang
374b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bsrel pa bzlas byung ba rnams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi
374b8(mdo sde): po gang lags pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thog pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dung
375a1(mdo sde): po gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjesu yi rang ba mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rjesu yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi rang
375a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spod pa na/ pha rol// tra phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'das bgyis pa gang lags pa
375a3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi ngo // rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso ba dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang gyi nom pa dang / bla ma dang / dran
375a4(mdo sde): med pa dang / lhag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rje su yi ra // ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
375a5(mdo sde): dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyu ra ba gang legs pa de dag thams cad la yang rdzas
375a6(mdo sde): yi rang ba'i mchog go rje su yi rang // rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / ltag na med pa dang / 
375a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rje su yi rango // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub kyi phyir
375a8(mdo sde): spyod pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon pa 'du bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rdzi su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes sa
375b1(mdo sde): rang / rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso ba dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / lhag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi ma
375b2(mdo sde): pa dang mnyam pas rje su yi ra // skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / 
375b3(mdo sde): sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
375b4(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu bzung ba/ chos kyi char rab tu ba po chos kyi cha
375b5(mdo sde): tu gtang ba/ chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs pa/ chos kyi rnga bo che rab tu brdungs pa/ chos kyi dung bus pa/ chos kyi srog shing bsgreng ba/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/ 
375b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par ma dzad pa/ nyam thag du spyod du gtsud pa gang lags pa dang / de la nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
375b7(mdo sde): pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrad pa gang lags de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i
375b8(mdo sde): mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyi rje su yi ngo // skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la
376a1(mdo sde): // thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i sladadu ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag blan
376a2(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i bar dag gang lags pa dang / de la nyan thos
376a3(mdo sde): theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ba gang lags
376a4(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi rang // skye bo mang
376a5(mdo sde): po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i sladadu/ da lder pog
376a6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor la
376a7(mdo sde): rab tu bskor ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi char rab tu gtong ba/ chos kyi sbyin pa
376a8(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi rnga brdung gi/ chos kyi rnga bo che brdung ba/ chos kyi dung 'bud pa/ chos kyi srog shing sgreng ga sams can thams cad la
376b1(mdo sde): chos kyi sbyin pas nim par mdzad pa/ nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa gang lags pa dang / de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems
376b2(mdo sde): dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi reng ba na
376b3(mdo sde): rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi ra // zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ni rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po'o// rigs kyi bu
376b4(mdo sde): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnga su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis rdza su yi rang ba nas/ bsod nams kyi phung po grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed// shA ri'i bu stongs
376b5(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dag
376b6(mdo sde): pa zag pa zad par gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de dag la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gos zas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / ye
376b7(mdo sde): byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang zhig rje su yi rang ba 'dis rje su yi rang na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med/ dpag tu med pa skyed do// 
376b8(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ rjes yi rang ba
377a1(mdo sde): 'das rnasu la 'ang bar bya'o// bu med smras pa'i dbang ba thob par 'ad cing bud med kyi dbang ba rjes par 'dod pas kyang rje su yi rang ba 'di rje su yi rang bar la/ 
377a2(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
377a3(mdo sde): chen po rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa bskyed par 'gyur ba'i bskul ba'i phung po bshangadu gsol// das
377a4(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la
377a5(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bag pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems cad gzhan
377a6(mdo sde): ngag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ blags phrag pa
377a7(mdo sde): gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig
377a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag
377b1(mdo sde): nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brje bad
377b2(mdo sde): skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / smon pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan tu gsol/ chos kyi tshul rab tu
377b3(mdo sde): gzung du gsol/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa gzung du gsol/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ chos kyi char dbang du gsol/ chos kyi rnga brdung du gsol/ chos kyi rnga bo che
377b4(mdo sde): brdung du gsol/ chos kyi dung bud du gsol/ chos kyi srog shing bsgreng du gsol// zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu ga zhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan
377b5(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ se
377b6(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad
377b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ tshe'i 'du byed ma btang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas pa
377b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ gsol pa 'debs kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten lajug
378a1(mdo sde): 'du bdag / slob pam dag / lha dang ma rnams kya dadang / sman pa dang / ba ba'i ma rgyas kyi labar lan rab tu bshar/ sa kyi rnam mam ba ba ma
378a2(mdo sde): char ni rab tu 'bebs chos kyi char ni rab tu gtong / chos kyi rnga ni rab tu rdung / chos kyi rnga bo che ni rab tu rdung / chos kyi dung ni rab tu 'bud/ chos kyi srog shing ni rab tu bsgreng / chos kyi
378a3(mdo sde): snun man mchod par mdzad/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas ni tshim par mdzad/ ma ngag tu spyad 'jug cing re shig bzhug su gsol/ gsal ba btab pa'i ja
378a4(mdo sde): bai 'di yang bla na ma dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nu tu yong su bsngo ste/ ji ltar blan med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa byang chub tu ma su rdza ba bzhin du
378a5(mdo sde): 'di yang yongasu bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gsol ba gdab pa'i phung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gsol ba gdab pa'i phung pa 'dis gas
378a6(mdo sde): ba 'debs na/ bsod nams mang po grangs med dpag/ tu med pa skye // shA ri'i ririgs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ji rten gyi
378a7(mdo sde): khams ji snyed pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo
378a8(mdo sde): bskor bar bskul na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhog ste/ shA rI'i bu
378b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhir ga
378b2(mdo sde): pa rnams la dbul ba phul bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsol ba btab na/ de ni de bas bsod nams nas mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyedado// de ci
378b3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sprad pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des na
378b4(mdo sde): nga la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / 
378b5(mdo sde): skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol zhes/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar
378b6(mdo sde): gsal ba btapo// shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub kyi phyir sbed pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ring du bzhugs par gsol te// dge ba'i rtsa ba des rang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
378b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / yongasu
378b8(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/ nga'i dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyuro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces
379a1(mdo sde): // gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi du mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa
379a2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal za/ 
379a3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar yongasu bsngo bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
379a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA rI'i bu 'di la rig sa kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
379a5(mdo sde): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
379a6(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum mtshan len gsum du/ tshig 'di skad ces thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas/ 'khor ba na 'khor
379a7(mdo sde): ba'i tshe/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis par gyur pa// sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun nam/ gang zag gam/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su song ba rnams
379a8(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag la yang rung ste/ phan chang gi cig tsam sbal bar gyur pa gang lags pa dang 'chags pa gang lags pa dang / gsal ba gang po pa gang 'gas padang
379b1(mdo sde): sbyangasu mchi ba gang lags pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / so sor 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / rje su yi
379b2(mdo sde): rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gang lags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus gzhal
379b3(mdo sde): bzlums te/ sems dul zhing rnam par grol ba dang / gzung ba ma mchis pas sems can thams cad la stsal to// ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad la gang
379b4(mdo sde): bar bgyi ga/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas/ ji ltar mkhyen pa de lta dus bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de ba / sa
379b5(mdo sde): can thams cad la gnas rin po che dang ldan par gyur cig/ na mkha'i mdzod dang / longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang / bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang / chos zad mi shes
379b6(mdo sde): pa dang / ye shes zad mi shes pa dang / spobs pa zad mi shes pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen
379b7(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu sdus/ gzhal bzlums te/ bla na med pa yang
379b8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa
380a1(mdo sde): / 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis byang chub kyi phyir
380a2(mdo sde): spyod pa na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i
380a3(mdo sde): sladadu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
380a4(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir smod pa na/ thad
380a5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i sladadu// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yong su sngo bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad
380a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bste'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
380a7(mdo sde): gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar da lta na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa
380a8(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i sladadu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu sngo ba de bzhin du/ bde ge gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ 
380b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yong su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab du gyur cig/ 
380b2(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin pa
380b3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab go/ dri ma med pa shin tu dkar ba la bzhugs nas/ bdud sdig can bcom ste/ shes par bgyi ba dang / blta bar bgyi ba dang / rtogs pa bkri ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par
380b4(mdo sde): byang chub par bgyi ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad nam gyi tha rangs skya reng 'char kar skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bdud dri bsnyes te 'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i
380b5(mdo sde): lam mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du/ bdag dang / sems can thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
380b6(mdo sde): rgyu bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / 'od mchog dang / 'od dag dang / bsod nam
380b7(mdo sde): 'od dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / seng ge dang / 'od zer brgya pa dang / 'od zer mthong dang / 'od dra ba can dang / rin chen 'od 'phro dang / 'od 'bar dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang / shin tu brgyan dang / 
380b8(mdo sde): rin chen tog dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / yan lag mchog de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / sangs rgyas ba
381a1(mdo sde): / ldan 'das gzhan dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ji tsam du skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la
381a2(mdo sde): bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du bdag dang / sem can
381a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs ba
381a4(mdo sde): ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bsko/ bar shog ces brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ni yo
381a5(mdo sde): bsngo ba'i phung po ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas/ yongasu bsngo ba'i phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba na sa/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu
381a6(mdo sde): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mdo 'di len tam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de ni bsod nams kyi phung po
381a7(mdo sde): de bas ches mang du grangs med/ dpag tu med pa spyod// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par me'i
381a8(mdo sde): lus thob par gyur la/ snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob nas kyang / rang byang chub thob par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis ste stang dang / phu dung bya ba'i phyir/ 
381b1(mdo sde): gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byas te/ rim gro bya ba la lan cig kyang / rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam
381b2(mdo sde): gyi rin po che rnams yongasu zad par byas la/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun te/ gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / 
381b3(mdo sde): spug dang / mu tig dmar po las phang du dpag tshad bcu par byas te/ de dag la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang kha dan dang / ba dan phra mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas na/ shA ri'i bu 'di
381b4(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lag so// bcom ldan 'das
381b5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang 'di 'dzin tam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'don par byed dam/ klog gam/ skye bo mang po yang dag
381b6(mdo sde): par rab tu ston tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs na/ da ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed/ bsod nams kyi phung po lnga mas bsod
381b7(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bsgrub pa
381b8(mdo sde): 'di la gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba'i phyir// shA ri'i bu sbyin pa rnams kyi
381'a1(mdo sde): / nang na 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa mchog ces ngas bshad// de nas 'khor de las srog chags khri stan las langs te/ so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ dus ma
381'a2(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ca
381'a3(mdo sde): gis sde 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// bsgrub pa la gnas par bgyi'o// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni
381'a4(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos de lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal zhing don tu gnyer ba lag so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
381'a5(mdo sde): byin gyis bcom ldan 'das dang / chos kyi rnam grang sa 'di la lha'i me tog man da ra bas mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas kyang / tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan
381'a6(mdo sde): 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i gces spras bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan 'ad
381'a7(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhi no// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i dbang po ngas mngon par shes te/ 'di nas bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med par
381'a8(mdo sde): gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 'od gzer gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 
381'b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung // lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
381'b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po'i tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to// de'i nyan thos thog ma 'dus pa ni bye ba phrag 'bum yod/ thams
381'b3(mdo sde): kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa sha sta go// de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa ni/ bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod de/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa sha / 
381'b4(mdo sde): de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa ni/ bye ba brgya stong/ phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha sta go// lha'i dbang po de nas de bzhin gshegs
381'b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po de// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa
381'b6(mdo sde): skye dgu'i don gyi phyir rgyu'o// lha'i dbang po de'i tshe bud med gang+gA'i lha mo zhes bya ba zhig/ 'khor pa 'dus pa de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan
381'b7(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi phung po chen po las mngon sum bzung / kun chub par byas/ blangs nas skye bo mang po la yang dag par bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
381'b8(mdo sde): byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// de de nas shi 'phos nas/ bud med kyi lus spangs te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob na/ rtag par rgyun tu lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du skyes ste/ lan
382a1(mdo sde): ga brgyad khri ba ni stong 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur to// ke'u shi ka 'di nas shar phyogs na/ sangs rgyas
382a2(mdo sde): zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyan/ chos ston te/ ngas da lta na yang mthong // ko'u shi ka su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rin
382a3(mdo sde): chen 'od 'phro da'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par nges par 'gyu ro// bud med gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo/ 
382a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad yongasu mya ngan las 'das par nges par 'gyuraro// lha'i dbang po da ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'
382a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubapa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i gces spras byed pa yino// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
382a6(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha
382a7(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//  nu shi ka de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku
382a8(mdo sde): snod ces bya bar yang zung shig/ 'di som nyi gcod pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa
382b1(mdo sde): bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes
382b2(mdo sde): batheg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs ste// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// 
382b3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harma ke du d+hA dza pa ri prin+da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang
382b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos yu gcig na/ bcom ldan 'angs mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sgri
382b5(mdo sde): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
382b6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya su 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
382b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyuro// bcu gang zhe na 'dir byang chub sems dpa' dang pa dang ldan
382b8(mdo sde): par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongasu mi gtong ba dang / dgon pa brten cing 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / bla ma dang / mkhan pa'i gas
383a1(mdo sde): ngag yongs bsal ba dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / 'dzin 'grus phur sum legs pas don sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan
383a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ches kyi rgyal mtshan dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i lader de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
383a3(mdo sde): / 'phags pa ches kyi rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs ste// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sti bi bar ta bya ka ra Na na nA ma mahA
383a4(mdo sde): sa na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad pa
383a5(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga steng gi dge 'an chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mngon pa
383a6(mdo sde): grags pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la dge pa'i rtsa
383a7(mdo sde): bskyed pa/ zag pa chen po'i rjesu song ba/ sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / bang rim 'dzin dang / mched sbyin rus
383a8(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / snang ba'i blo gros dang / rnam par dag pa'i blo gros dang / sbyangs pa'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / mtha' yas blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mthong dga' dang / 
383b1(mdo sde): legs mthong dang / cher snang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang kun mthong la sogs pa dang / thabs gcig tu bzhug so// byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i
383b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid 'dus par gyur te 'khod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na rten cing bzhugs te/ rgyal
383b3(mdo sde): dang rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / reng dben rnams dang / khyim bdag rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / 'khor rnams dang / grong rdal dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis dkur bsti byas/ bla mar
383b4(mdo sde): byas ri mor byas/ mchod pa byaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ smad g.yogs dang / chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ga la
383b5(mdo sde): der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
383b6(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdang gsum bdag gi rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa zhig mthong ste/ ngas phyag gas
383b7(mdo sde): pa gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas bdag gi spyi bor bzhag ste/ rab 'byor sang khyod kyis sngon ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa thos par 'gyur zhes/ de skad ces bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das
383b8(mdo sde): de gang gi snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo chos 'dod pa rnams kyi sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas
384a1(mdo sde): yi no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer ran por bsod snyoms la 'a
384a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la

384a4(mdo sde): snyoms la rgyu zhing song ba las/ khyim bdag gcig gis gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ ske gang gi nang 'ogasu cang mi smra bar sdod do// de ras khyim de'i nang nas bud med ma

384b1(mdo sde): chud dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ che zhe bdag gi bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes ni khong du chud mod kyi/ 'on kyang pha ma las skyes pa'i lus 'bras cad dang / zan drin gyis bskyed pa 'di zas med

385a6(mdo sde): zhe na nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ni lus dang sems kyi tshor ba myong ba ma mchiso// nyon mongs pa med pa ni lus dang sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma lagaso// nyon mongs pa
385a7(mdo sde): med pa ni dga' ba 'am/ mi dga' ba skyed par mi bgyid do// nyon mongs pa med pa ni su la yang nyon mongs pas nye bar gnas pa ma mchis// gzhan yang gang gi sladadu/ bcom ldan 'das
385a8(mdo sde): kyis btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan na/ ci'i slad mi nyon mongs pa med pa nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bgyi/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/

385b6(mdo sde): gi ches ma lag so// smras pa/ che zhe'in/ dge sbyong gi ches gang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi chos ni tha snyad ma mchis pa/ phyin ci ma log pa rtsod pa ma mchis pa'o/ 
385b7(mdo sde): dge sbyong gi ches ni ches dang / ches ma lags pa dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni chags pa dang ma chags pa dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni yul ma mchis pa dang yul ma

389a7(mdo sde): dper na/ sa'i khams la gzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi sems dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsel mi 'tshalo// btsun pa rab 'byor tshul
389a8(mdo sde): bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du gang gi sems chu dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshalo// me dang / rlung dang / na mkha' la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du// 
389b1(mdo sde): gang gi sems me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal// btsun pa rab 'byor gru dang / stegs dang / zam pa dang / lam po tshal bzed pa gsol mi 'tsha

389b5(mdo sde): bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag gi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi gang dag nyon mongs pa med pa de dag la ni bzod pa gsol mi
389b6(mdo sde): 'tsha'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smra so// tsha zhe khyod ci zhig 'dod na 'di ltar sang+ge'i sgra sgregs/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang 'dod pa mchis
389b7(mdo sde): pa de ni seng+ga'i sgra sgeg mi nus// gang dag ci yang mi 'dod pa de dag ni seng ge'i sgra sgregs par bgyidado// de ci'i slad zhe na/ dmigs pa mchis pa la ni 'dod pa mchis la gang la da
389b8(mdo sde): pa mchis pa de la ni seng+ge'i sgra ci yang mchi so// 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma mchis pa la ni 'dod pa mchis la/ gang la lta ba'i rnam pa mchis pa de la ni seng+ge'i sgra ci yang mam
390a1(mdo sde): / btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang ci zhig bzhed pas len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur/ smras pa/ tshe ni 'dod pa yod pa la ni rnam par grol pa
390a2(mdo sde): yang medo// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'bar gang bzhed pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba de bzhin du bdag kyang de lta bu'i 'jug pas zhug so// bdag kyang de lta bu'i rnam
390a3(mdo sde): par grol ba'i 'jug pas zhug so// bdag kyang de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'jug pas zhug so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smras// mazhi theg pa
390a4(mdo sde): rnam pa gang yin pa rnams dang / rtags gang yin pa rnams dang / mtshan ma gang dag yin pa 'di lta bu dag bdag la ston pa las na/ khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yi
390a5(mdo sde): par the tsam med// bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor the ga pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams mkhyen tam/ smras pa/ che zhe nyan
390a6(mdo sde): thos kyis ni ma thos par theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams shes par mi nus kyis/ cha zhe theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams
390a7(mdo sde): dang mtshan ma rnams shod cig/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i theg pa dang / sgribs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes dang
390a8(mdo sde): dad pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dag so// btsun pa rab 'byor dper na/ las su 'gro ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i gzhal med khang rnams ni/ sems can
390b1(mdo sde): la snang bar bgyi ba'i sladadu/ chags pa ma mchis pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyun mi chad par na mkha' la shugs kyis mchi ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po la
390b2(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams ni/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi snang ba bgyi ba'i slad/ chags pa ma mchis pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyun mi cha
390b3(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi shugs kyis mchi so// btsun pa rab 'byor dper na/ gling bzhi ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i legs te/ de dag dang gang du mchi ba de dang der gling bzhi
390b4(mdo sde): pa'i mi rnams kyis bsten pa'i 'osu 'gyur ba lags la/ 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang sems can de dag la bsam pa mi mnyam pa'i rnam pa ma mchis te/ bya
390b5(mdo sde): par bgyid pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal lam/ 
390b6(mdo sde): ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad/ gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der/ sems can thams cad kyis brten pa'i 'osu 'gyur ba lags la/ sems ca
390b7(mdo sde): thams cad la sems snyoms shing / tha dad du spyod pa ma mchi so// byang chub sems ni bsdu ba rnam pa bzhis sdud pa na sems can rnams la byams pa tha dad pa ma mchis te/ sa
390b8(mdo sde): theg pa chen po zhes dgyi'o// btsun pa rab 'bar theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni theg pa de che ba lags la/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / ra mkha' lding
391a1(mdo sde): mi 'am ni dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten sgreng ba rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / skyes
391a2(mdo sde): dam pa rnams dang / shes pa rnams dang / yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis mchod pa lags te/ des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// thab pa de ni ma
391a3(mdo sde): skyes pa'i phyir mi zad pa'o// theg pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa'o// zag pa de ni chos kyi rigs sdud pa'o// theg pa de ni dge 'dun gyi rigs yong su 'dzin pa'o// zag pa
391a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byor cing sgrib pa med pa'i langs pa'o// theg pa de ni 'phan ma mchis pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'o// theg pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis
391a5(mdo sde): natu sbyangs pa'i byas pa'o// thag pa de ni bsdu ba rnam bzhis legs par bsdus pa'o// theg pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rje su 'drang ba'i phyi
391a6(mdo sde): shin tu yang dag par song ba'o// theg pa de ni zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong bsgom pas/ bzhon pa bzang po dang ldan pa'o// theg pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / byang chub kyi sems
391a7(mdo sde): mi brjid pa'i phyir kha lo sgyur bzang po'i gan so// theg pa de ni snying rje chen pos shin tu brtan pa'o// theg pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis legs par gnas pa'o// theg pa
391a8(mdo sde): bdad thams cad pham par byas pas 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o// theg pa de ni shes rab kyi snang ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir mun pa dang bral ba'o// theg pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha
391b1(mdo sde): sdad cing sogs pas shin tu 'byor pa'o// theg pa de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyis pa'o// theg pa de ni pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba'o// theg pa de ni nyan thos
391b2(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba'o// theg pa de ni ma dad pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni sdang ba rnams byams par bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni ser sna
391b3(mdo sde): can rnams kyi gtor ba bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni tshul tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams kyi tshul khribs bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni gnanod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi bzod pa
391b4(mdo sde): bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni le lo can rnams kyis brtson 'grus bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni brjod ngas pa rnams dran par bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams
391b5(mdo sde): bar zhi bar bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni shes rab 'tshal pa rnams kyi shes rab bgyid pa'o// zag pa de ni dbul po rnams kyi nor bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni sdug bsngal ba rnams
391b6(mdo sde): bde bar bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni mkhas pa rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni shes pa rnams dang bar bgyid pa ste/ des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan
391b7(mdo sde): parab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smra so// cha zhe khyed kyis theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams lags par smras// bud med nges smras pa
391b8(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams ni bskal pa 'am/ de bas ches lhag par bdag gis bshang lags kyang mthar phyin par ma
392a1(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po ji ltar tshad ma mchis pa de bzhin du rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams kyang rang ma mam so// ma dang ldan pa
392a2(mdo sde): 'dor gyis bud med de la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras// che zhe khyed kyi bdag la khyod ci zhig 'dod de bsod skems la rgyu bar byed ces glags brtul ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
392a3(mdo sde): kyimanga' bdag nyid kyang / bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad na khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de'i glags btsal lam/ bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'ber gal te de da/ 
392a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa thabs gang gis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad pa mkhyen pa lta na/ de slebs par mdzod cig/ rab 'khyer gyis smras pa/ chen de bzhin gshegs pa thabs ji lta
392a5(mdo sde): zhig gis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad/ bud med nges smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni dzin gyi dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig gzigs nas bsod snyoms
392a6(mdo sde): la rmya ba mdzad/ nyi shu rtsa gcig po gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi sku bzang po bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad/ dar sems can gang dag gis de
392a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes du chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mthong ba de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
392a8(mdo sde): kyi sku mtshan 'thob par 'gyi ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi sku'i dbang de gzig
392b1(mdo sde): nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang / grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshegs na/ sems can long ba rnams kyis ni
392b2(mdo sde): gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ sems can 'on pa rnams kyis ni sgra thos par 'gyur/ sems can smon pa rnams kyi ni dran pa rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can gcer bu
392b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni gos rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can bkres pa rnams kyis ni zas rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can skom pa rnams kyis ni btung ba rnyed par 'gyur la/ sems can su
392b4(mdo sde): la yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / khro ba dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / yongasu gdung ba'i gnod pa ma mchis/

392b6(mdo sde): pa greng dang / grong khyer du gshegs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskrad par bgyid / btsun

393a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la 'dod pa skye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngo mtshar che ba nas/ rmad du 'byung ba'i bar gyi chos dang ldan snyam ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dod pa skyed na

393a6(mdo sde): de mes pa dang / gzugs dang / rigs dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad med pas rgyags shing myos pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor nas/

393a8(mdo sde): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsad sems lacu

393b3(mdo sde): ga kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying brtse ba ched cher bya ba'i sems kyis bsod snyoms la rgyu bar bya'o zhes smra zhing / de dag gis de lta bu mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag

393b5(mdo sde): yang sems can le la can snyom lnga can de bzhin gshe gas pa la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / kha snye na bkur bgyi ba'i sladu/ mi mchi ba de dag de bzhin gshegs
393b6(mdo sde): grong dang / grong khyer du gshegs na 'bad mi 'tshal bar mthong bar 'gyur la/ mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po 'thob par 'gyur te/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dag

394b1(mdo sde): de de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang / grong khyer du gshegs pa mthong na/ tshim zhing mgu la/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa

395a7(mdo sde): tu mkhregs shing khong sdong ma lags la/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la pho ba 'am/ leng ka yang mi mnga' phyis yang mi mnga'/ gcin mang mi
395a8(mdo sde): mnga' mod kyi 'on kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dang / bshos gsol ba de lta bur yang gda' la khong du mi chud pa yang mi mnga' ste/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / ldam
395b1(mdo sde): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mang po dag gi de mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
395b2(mdo sde): bsred par bgyid/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gcu

395b4(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon rnams mthar thug par bgyid par mi nus te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa mang po dag
395b5(mdo sde): kyang nyam su myong bar 'gyur la/ sngon de yang yongasu mya nga las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bas par mi 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas
